28.name: Viola
28.title: Clockwork-Doll

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
Viola, the best work of Doll Master, has strong self-awareness and learning ability. 

She was taken to a theatrical troupe by Marina and then started to tour around with the troupe.

Her delicate and flexible joints, long blond hair, and beautiful dancing posture quickly made her the focus of the troupe. 

Her Waltz of soulful dance steps always hit the heart of the audience so just a brief mentioning of Viola's Waltz was enough to make the townsfolk shell out.

Unlike the other dolls, she was restless and tired of performing day in and day out. 

One night, she finally picked up her courage, blended into the crowd, and escaped from the troupe at the end of the show.

Though knowing nothing about the outside world, she is not worried. 

"It's okay. I possess the most powerful core." 

"I'm sure I can go further."

skill1.name: Traumatic Light
skill1.description: After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Viola's ATK.

skill2.name: Twisted Souls
skill2.description: For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

skill3.name: Rebuild
skill3.description: After taking lethal damage, Viola reveals her mechanical core, which takes <color=#82C65D>50%</color> more damage. If the core is not destroyed within 5s, the Doll will be auto repaired. Can only trigger once per combat.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

29.name: Celanya
29.title: Azure Archer of Wind

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Celanya's grandfather and father are the most outstanding hunters in the village, and she inherited their talents through their bloodline. $B$$B$She has started practicing archery since childhood so she can feel the breath of the prey, even in the dark night.$B$It's her somatosensory system rather than her vision that plays a part in detecting the target.

Due to her great strength, she has absolute confidence in her archery skills. $B$She claims that "Every shot hits the bull's-eye". $B$$B$When shooting, she thinks of herself as an arrow, emotionless and undivided, flying straight to the target.

She has high self-esteem and often feels empty due to a lack of worthy opponents. $B$$B$Like her father, the Silverbow, she is also eager to challenge someone more powerful. $B$$B$"If I find the legendary Fallen God, then I can both train myself and find the way to stop the snowstorm." $B$$B$With such a simple thought, Celanya carries her beloved longbow and sets out alone to the mountain peak.

Though claiming to be unrivaled, she actually is not a match for her father.$B$$B$She had been following her father's steps and imitating her father to do the hunting practice, but soon she found out that imitation wouldn't help her to surpass her father but just leave her behind her father as always. $B$$B$After realizing this, she was kind of lost and hated herself for being weak. $B$$B$
These changes certainly didn't escape her father's attention. He covered her eyes and took her to the target.$B$"Can you feel the target?" Celanya nodded. "Then take ten steps backward. Can you still feel that?" "Ten more steps."$B$$B$
Over and over again, when Celanya removed the blindfold, she found she was a hundred steps away from the target but she could still feel the target.$B$$B$
"See, this is what you're capable of." $B$$B$Father's words are engraved in her mind. After then, she gave up the strength training but focuses on practicing her archery. $B$She puts aside all distracting thoughts and works to be an emotionless archer master.

skill1.name: Blast Arrows
skill1.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of ATK.

skill2.name: Azure Wind
skill2.description: Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Celanya's ATK.

skill3.name: Dashing Arrows
skill3.description: With each attack, deals <color=#82C65D>2%</color> more damage and ignores the enemies' Physical DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>2%</color> of self ATK. Can stack up to <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for both.

special_equip.name: Soaring Skies
special_equip.description: A great bow given to Celanya by her father. Only the best hunter in the village is allowed to wield it. A mere man can hardly even draw the bowstring.

30.name: Arcana
30.title: Fortune Teller

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: She used to set up a stall on the street and practice divination to earn a living, but soon came to the attention of the Senatus because of her oddly accurate divinations. $B$$B$The Senatus immediately invited her to serve them, divining political affairs and the future of the country.

After that, she had become a celebrity in high society, but she misses her street life much more. 

In her eyes, the nobles are the same as ordinary folks. There is no need to give them any special treatment. 

Money and fame are mere worldly possessions.

She is occasionally seen in the street taverns, exuding a noble air seemingly out of place. 

With slightly flushed cheeks, she raises her glass and invites you to sit down.

"Drink this and you will be intoxicated by your own destiny."

Irminsul is her hometown, and what appears in Chilora is only her phantom. 

It is not clear who projected her phantom into Chilora. There seems to be a deep secret lurking behind it.

skill1.name: Divination
skill1.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK and increases energy generation rate for 5s. There's a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance of increasing energy regeneration rate by 40% for 5s and a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance of increasing energy generation rate by 100% for 5s.

skill2.name: Fatum
skill2.description: Increases the Magic DMG of the whole team for 5 seconds. There's a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance of increasing Magic DMG by 30%, and a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance of increasing Magic DMG by 100%.

skill3.name: Foresight
skill3.description: When using Divination, <color=#82C65D>10%</color> more chance to trigger the better outcomes of her spells.

special_equip.name: Fool's Trek
special_equip.description: Can peer into people's hearts and guide them forward.

32.name: Elis
32.title: Queen of the Forest

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Elis, like the rest of her clan who grew up in the forest, lives in symbiosis with the animals, and learns the necessary skills to hunt.

Elis is a born warrior. The wild power entwined in her genes soon made her stand out as the best hunter in the clan. Later, she was elected chief. 

Even feral beasts do not dare to behave in front of her. 

Even a fierce tiger becomes as docile as a pet while receiving a simple glare from her.

Elis firmly believes in the law of the jungle, but unlike the rest of the clan, she doesn't try to exterminate all the intruders of the forest. 

Perhaps, to the Queen of the Forest, those invaders are just a group of nonentities.

She used to live in the forest with her clan. However, to protect the forest from invasion by the outsiders, Elis and her clan chose to pledge their loyalty to the Protector. 

No one dares to invade the forest ever since.

skill1.name: Swoop
skill1.description: Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>80%</color> of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.

skill2.name: Finality
skill2.description: Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Elis' ATK.

skill3.name: Hunting Instinct
skill3.description: Increases damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> every 30 seconds, up to 50%.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

33.name: Cynetia
33.title: Warped Hymn

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory:
Cynetia used to be a nurse at the Capital Hospital of the Principality of Lunia, but got prohibited from engaging with any patient due to her character defects, so only cleaning work in the hospital fell upon her. 

As Princess Eulalia visited the hospital, Cynetia's healing talent was discovered, and then she was asked to follow Eulalia traveling around to cure injured civilians. Out of her admiration for Eulalia, she assented gladly.

She is a considerate and caring girl but has a distorted perception of pain. 

She never refuses the needs of others, to the point that it makes her dangerous. 

For patients who are suffering from pain, Cynetia adds to their psychological burden.

Unlike others, Eulalia never blames Cynetia for her eccentricity and accepts everything about her. 

With a simple thought that she shouldn't cause trouble for the Princess, Cynetia puts away the morbid part in her personality and assists Eulalia to cure the injured.

She occasionally shows her true nature, even removing bandages in front of patients, then skillfully replacing them with new ones and meanwhile letting out strange laughter. 

Curiously, she enjoys high popularity among certain circles, which also perplexes Eulalia.

skill1.name: Emergence Heal
skill1.description: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Cynetia's ATK. Healing is increased by 50% when the Doll's Health is below 50%.

skill2.name: Hymn to Bandage
skill2.description: Heals all allies with bandages for 10s, restoring Health equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Cynetia's ATK per second. Also increases ATK of all allies by <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of her ATK.

skill3.name: Joy of Agony
skill3.description: When Health is below 50%, removes debuffs and restores <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of max Health. Can only trigger once per combat.

special_equip.name: Eternal Bond
special_equip.description: A hair accessory gifted by Eulalia, that has been deeply cherished by Cynetia.

34.name: Shuffle
34.title: Annihilator of Existence

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory:
She was born into an ordinary family in the Kingdom of Pannonia but after the war took away her parents, she was brought up in an orphanage. 

When she fell into delusion, she always wore a strange smile, which alienated her from the other children.

It is not clear what twisted her character. She craves love madly, even morbidly. 

Whatever she wants, she'll do anything in her power to get.

No one came to see her off when she left the orphanage, but the lone girl soon made others remember her name. 

There was evidence showing that plenty of murders were somehow linked to her and thus her notoriety spread through the underclasses.

Though she has committed lots of crimes, the war-torn Pannonia needs her strength. 

Those in power want her to fight the intruders, and pluck out the thorns in their side. 

So they turn a blind eye to her morbid behavior and employ this infamously sinful girl who can obliterate anyone that becomes her target.

skill1.name: Locked
skill1.description: Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>80%</color> of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.

skill2.name: Wipe
skill2.description: Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.

skill3.name: Thirst
skill3.description: Increases Physical DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>5%</color> for each damage taken, up to 50%. Can trigger once every 2 seconds.

special_equip.name: Oblivion
special_equip.description: Once stained with blood, it locks on the target until it snuffs the life out of them.

35.name: Lilia
35.title: Princess of Aurora

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
She is a princess who will inherit the crown of the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North, but she really hates life inside the castle. 

Though often reprimanded by her father for sneaking out, she cares little of his scoldings.

Often misunderstood as a pretty face with a heart of ice, she actually has a naive personality, which makes her the most popular young girl in the country. 

Every time before sneaking out of the castle, she has to carefully disguise herself to avoid recognition.

She enjoys sitting by the lake at night and admiring the beautiful starry sky. 

As it is written in the poems, above the bright river of stars, the North Star guiding the northern vault of heaven is the most dazzling, by which the people of Holmgard can navigate, and the soothsayers can foretell the future of the country.

Lilia yearns for a free life, so she secretly leaves her hometown and embarks on a long-awaited trip. 

But she can not restrain the complex feelings of homesickness that haunt her during the journey. 

"Is there any difference between here and my hometown? The gorgeous aurora of my hometown, the stunning sight known as the Celestial Colors..."

skill1.name: Aurora Surge
skill1.description: Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>150%</color> of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.

skill2.name: Brilliant Melody
skill2.description:
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. 
Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>150%</color> of ATK to all enemies.

skill3.name: Aurora's Blessing
skill3.description: Generates 1 Order Energy every <color=#82C65D>3</color> seconds.

special_equip.name: Sparkling Ice
special_equip.description: Made from the coldest crystals in Snegurochka, emitting chilling aurora.

36.name: Cuspidata
36.title: Red Pupils of Madness

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
Cuspidata is a young girl of high standing in Fomoire. 

Seemingly timid, she is the successor of the Mad-eyes, who is just reluctant to look others in the eye.

In Fomoire, the Six Ovates are in the highest position, respectively from six different families. 

The Ovates inheriting the bloodlines of their own families all possess some marvelous powers. 

Cuspidata, the Ovate in charge of the "Sùil (Eye)", has inherited the most precious legacy of the Tasius family—Mad-eyes. 

Anyone who looks directly into her eyes will be controlled by her until they're mentally deranged.

She is feared by everyone, all alone without any friends. 

Only the doll in her hand keeps her company, which is said to be sewn by herself. She cherishes it very much. 

"The moonlight tonight reeks of madness." 

"That's why you don't hide from me, right?"

Tasius is such a special family that all members more or less have some non-human traits in their blood, thus all having a short lifespan. 

Normally dormant, the trait would awaken only under extraordinary circumstances. 

Cuspidata had a quite peaceful childhood just like others but as her younger brother suddenly got his inhuman traits awakened and went mad till death, she couldn't handle her sadness which finally awakened her non-human trait. 

Luckily, Cuspidata has a great command of the magic so she can freely manipulate the Mad-eyes without ending up in the same dire madness as other family members.

skill1.name: Great Eye
skill1.description: Attacks a single target 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Cuspidata's ATK.

skill2.name: Redeye
skill2.description: Increases DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> for 5s.

skill3.name: Evil Eye
skill3.description: Normal attack and skills reduce enemies' damage by <color=#82C65D>6%</color> for 6s. Can stack up to up to 30%.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

38.name: Metamorphoses
38.title: Dominator of Souls

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: A spiritist who appears only during the full moon. $B$She claims to have no feelings, but controls the feelings of those around her by manipulating her mask. $B$$B$Often mistaken for a dangerous monster, she's kept away from others but she couldn't care less about it.$B$$B$Some say she never shows her feelings so that no one could ever guess her real thoughts, which makes people feel intimidated.

Very little is written about her, except that she is known as Metamorphoses, a shape-shifter who never leaves a trace. $B$$B$Sometimes she is seen playing with Nocturna and Ella under the moonlight but no one dares to approach them. $B$$B$Though they have different personalities, they get along very well.

No one knows exactly what she is thinking because her blank face can hardly be read. $B$$B$On the contrary, she can see through everything about the person in front of her.$B$$B$
"Let me read your soul gently and elegantly."

She seems indifferent to everything around but her slight mood changes can be easily sensed by Nocturna. $B$$B$Recently, Nocturna has been obsessed with apples but when she buys apples in the town, people there just run off screaming upon seeing her. $B$Nocturna feels so upset that she brings Metamorphoses along and sneaks into the town to feast in the fruit warehouse many times. $B$$B$Soon, Nocturna has noticed the mood swings of Metamorphoses that she is apparently dissatisfied with this kind of theft. $B$Metamorphoses even wears a fierce-looking mask on the way back but Nocturna could care less because nothing is more important than having tasty apples.

skill1.name: Borrow
skill1.description:
Puts on a Mask of Souls for the whole team, granting an emotion (only one at a time). The mask switches to the next one automatically when using skills: 
Rage: Increases ATK for all allies. 
Joy: Increases Attack Speed for all allies. 
Sorrow: Reduces DMG taken for all allies. 
(A mask will be activated randomly when combat starts.)

skill2.name: Emotion Surge
skill2.description:
Gains buffs of all emotions for <color=#82C65D>X</color>seconds. Also gains bonus effect based on the current mask: 
Rage: Deals Magic DMG to all enemies and increases ATK for all allies, for <color=#82C65D>X</color>s. 
Joy: Increases Attack Speed for all allies again and deals extra Magic DMG when the unit is attacking, for <color=#82C65D>X</color>s. 
Sorrow: Reduces DMG taken for all allies again with a chance to restore the unit's Health when damaged, for <color=#82C65D>X</color>s.

skill3.name: Soul Collection
skill3.description: Every 20 seconds, increases self ATK by <color=#82C65D>40%</color> for 10s.

special_equip.name: Polyphase
special_equip.description: A mask that can connect with souls. It nibbles away at the wearer's heart.

39.name: Raphan
39.title: Claw of Destiny

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Looking like an awful lady, she actually is one of the high-status Six Ovates in Fomoire. She inherits the bloodline of Hameln, in charge of the "Cròg (Claw)".

People fear her more because of her hybrid appearance. $B$$B$The Hameln bloodline is mixed with wolf blood, but the majority of the clan maintain human appearances and act just like the ordinary folks do.

Raphan is an exception. $B$She awakened the blood of the beast inside her as a toddler. $B$$B$This power soon finds its usefulness, and she is worshiped as one of the Six Ovates by the people of Fomoire. $B$$B$She is given the task of guarding the Holy Forest on the island, mercilessly tearing to shreds any outsiders who attempt to sully its sanctity.$B$$B$
"You don't look like an intruder, so can you tell Raphan why fate has guided you to this place?"

Raphan is also seen as an anomaly among Six Ovates. $B$The Ovates all possess unique abilities, which somehow lead to the oddity of their personalities but they certainly have something in common, that is, acting like an Ovate and keeping a distance from the ordinary folks. $B$$B$Yet Raphan is nothing like that. $B$Being reckless, greedy, and lazy, she has a terrible personality and often plays tricks on others, all of which have nothing to do with an Ovate guarding this land. $B$She is really a big headache for Norn, the head of the Six Ovates.

skill1.name: Spear of Oath
skill1.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>400%</color> of ATK to all enemies.
When using this skill in the Wolf Spirit state, Raphan has a 50% chance to inflict Rip-off on the targets.
Rip-off: The target takes 20% more damage dealt by Spear of Oath for 10s, stacking up to 3 times.

skill2.name: Hameln's Bloodline
skill2.description:
Awakens the forbidden bloodline and enters the Wolf Spirit state. Increases ATK by 30% and heals self for 15% of damage dealt.
When using this skill in the Wolf Spirit state, Raphan deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK to all enemies and generates a shield for 10s that absorbs damage equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Wolf Spirit's Protection
skill3.description: When Raphan takes lethal damage, she is granted with immunity to all damages and heals self for <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of max Health for <color=#82C65D>5</color> seconds. Can be triggered once per combat.

special_equip.name: Virulenthorn
special_equip.description: A sacred object that's passed down the Hameln family, one of the Six Ovates that is in charge of the "Cròg (Claw)". Said to be able to pierce through everything.

40.name: Marina
40.title: Doll Master

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: She is the Doll Master from the Elf Lakeside, seemingly maintaining a good relationship with Caledonia, the Cloistered Princess.
She doesn't like contact with outsiders, often buried deep in her house by the lake making new dolls. $B$She can do this for weeks on end.

She firmly believes that her dolls can handle everything for her, not just simple household chores. $B$$B$Under her manipulation, those carefully crafted dolls are able to perform various fine movements, so impressive that people even wonder whether they have been brought to life.

At first, Marina just wanted to create a doll doing chores for her, which in a sense is an idea only slackers would come up with. $B$$B$Among all her creations, Viola is said to be her masterpiece. $B$After its completion, she sent it to a human village in order to test its ability to live independently.

skills.skill1: JS error while getting skill details
skills.skill2: JS error while getting skill details
skills.skill3: JS error while getting skill details

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

41.name: Ushpia
41.title: Queen of the Desert

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
The ruler of the Andes Tribes in the desert. 

Her beauty has conquered countless people. 

Her hardheaded ability can outmatch any man.

The tribes, once divided, fought over scarce water for many years. 

It is Ushpia who, using her thunderous abilities, led her people to sweep the entire desert and finally unified all the tribes in just a few years. 

She is eventually made ruler of all tribes.

Her enemies describe her as a serpentine beauty, and even spread rumors that she poisoned the former chief of the tribe and usurped power. 

However, Ushpia herself never responds to these accusations. 

Her enemies fear her mastery of witchcraft and poisoning. 

Anyone who tries to revolt will fall victim to her.

She was a slave suffering from much hardship in her early childhood. 

Therefore she is extremely wary of all people and obsessed with the pursuit of vanity. 

"Submit to me. Offer all thou hast as my belongings."

skill1.name: Poison Mist
skill1.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison for 5s. Can stack up to 10 times. 
Poison: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>20% + (10% * poison stacks)</color> of Ushpia's ATK every second.

skill2.name: Venom Eruption
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Poison to them. Each stack deals extra Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Paralyzed
skill3.description: Venom Eruption stuns the enemy for <color=#82C65D>1</color> second.

special_equip.name: Basilisk Soul
special_equip.description: A staff that symbolizes the power of the Desert Alliance, hosting the soul of the last Andes chieftain.

42.name: Acheronte
42.title: Bard of the Deceased

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
As the present ruler of the River of the Underworld, she cares greatly about her status as the Fallen Angel and the mention of it can enrage her. 

She's moody and unpredictable. The ghosts of the Underworld are often severely punished for offending her with even a small trifle.

She speaks a patrician language that is close to extinction. 

No one understands it except for herself and some deliverers. 

It seems she doesn't care about her unintelligible way of speaking, but rather sees it as a sign of her own nobility.

She likes singing by the River of the Underworld. 

It is said that all the ghosts will gather and bow down before her, and she will condescend to sing in an intelligible language for those she sees as inferiors. 

It is said that her only friend is Sher, the Wanderer of Fate. 
Acheronte admits that Sher is the only one willing to hear her singing and she once said Sher is not a real name. 
Sher has a higher status than Acheronte in the Underworld, which is quite confusing for other people to understand. What sort of being in the Underworld can be even nobler than the present ruler?

She will use honorifics only when referring to Sher. 

Otherwise, she always uses unintelligible words when speaking to others. 

"O fragile beings, beest grateful to mine own chanting f'r thee." 

"Thee crosseth the Lethe and stayeth in hell to atone f'r thy sins. This is thy only choice."

skill1.name: Wings of Hell Fire
skill1.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>5%</color> for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.

skill2.name: Praise of Death
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.

skill3.name: Aria
skill3.description: Increases ATK by <color=#82C65D>25%</color> after entering the combat for 30s.

special_equip.name: Divine Mercy
special_equip.description: A symbol of power held by the girl on the underworld throne. It seems to be telling a tale of salvation that echoes throughout the River of the Underworld.

43.name: Norn
43.title: Immortal Ovate

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: As the heir of the Koshchey family, she's the head of the Six Ovates in Fomoire. $B$$B$Looking like a lively and lovely maiden, she is said to have spent hundreds of years in this world.

House Koshchey, which is in charge of the "Cridhe (Heart)", is believed to be the descendants of the winged people who guarded all the living souls on earth in ancient times. 

Norn inherited an excellent lineage, able to control her appearance with magic to achieve eternal youth.

What is most intimidating about her is her ability to master life and death. Her body is said to have never changed due to her immortality. 

Beings that have reached this state will become bored to the point of insanity due to seeing through the veils of this world for too many years. 

Yet Norn is different. Through the long years, she still maintains the heart of a maiden, lovingly guarding her people and constantly looking for new fun. 

"Life, life starts from the darkness." 

"Death, death ends at the Liminal Field."

Lately under the influence of Miku, she has become more concerned with her appearance. 

Previously, she had never thought of changing her appearance because her body stays unchanged and there is no need for her to dress up for others. 

She has considered asking others how to dress up but as the head of the Six Ovates, she finds it hard to drop her pride, which has bothered her so much that she even couldn't set her mind on presiding over the sacrifice. 

She sneaked out from the ritual and hid in a corner alone with hands covering her blushing face. 

This girlish behavior was seen by Yui and recorded in her little book quietly for an unknown purpose.

skill1.name: Soul Cleansing
skill1.description: Within 5 seconds, attacks all enemies and heals all allies 7 times respectively, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Norn's ATK and healing allies for <color=#82C65D>55%</color> of Norn's ATK.

skill2.name: Bardo
skill2.description: Reduces damage taken by all allies by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> for 10s. When the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Norn's ATK.

skill3.name: Holy Heart
skill3.description: Heals all allies for 10% of Norn's ATK every <color=#82C65D>1</color> second.

special_equip.name: Soulcry
special_equip.description: A magical ornament. The Koshchey family, the steward of "Cridhe", wears it in sacrificial rituals to commune with the spirit of nature and to bestow blessings on Fomoire.

44.name: Parme
44.title: Truth Seeker

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: She is a young sorcerer from Andes. After bidding farewell to her master, she travels across the lands in search of the true meaning of magic.
In order to practice her abilities to control magic and meanwhile ward off any troubles along the way, Parme floats her wand behind her, declaring herself a powerful sorcerer.
During her travels, Parme meets many poor people who are unable to change their fate. $B$$B$Born with a kind nature, she gives all her money to them, which leads to her daily struggles with hunger.

She misses the dishes of her hometown, but she is so poor that she can only feed on simple foods. $B$Still, it doesn't seem to bother her. $B$$B$Recently she has started to practice alchemy, in the hope that it can get her fortune and improve her life. $B$$B$However, she is a sorcerer skilled in destructive magic rather than delicate magic, so all the practice of alchemy ends in failure.

skill1.name: Red Spike
skill1.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to a single target and gains <color=#82C65D>Energy Conserving</color> effect. (<color=#82C65D>Energy Conserving</color>: Reduces energy consumption of Spike Shower by 1. Can stack up to 2 times.)

skill2.name: Spike Shower
skill2.description: Attacks a single target 5 times, each hit dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. Removes <color=#82C65D>Energy Conserving</color> effect.

skill3.name: Unknown Name
skill3.description: Increases Attack Speed by 5% <color=#82C65D>(10% at Evolve 1)</color>

special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

45.name: Dana
45.title: Goddess of the Lake

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: She's the goddess worshiped by the creatures of the Elf Lakeside, and also the leader of the High Elves. $B$$B$She led the creatures of the Elf Lakeside to defend against the invasion of the ancient demongod Gordia and finally, with the help of Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, she eliminated the demongod and saved the world.

It is said that Dana has been sleeping at the bottom of the Lake since then, and only when her people are in grave danger will she again awaken to guard the Forest of Elves and her people. $B$But someone claimed that a noble lady appearing by the lake a few decades ago looked quite like the legendary Goddess Dana.

After Dana fell into a slumber, her maid, Mayahuel, is given the task of guarding the Forest of Elves and taking care of Flora. $B$$B$Another maid Mineer is responsible for guarding the Elf Lake. $B$They perform their own duties separately but manage the Elf Lakeside together, isolating the Lakeside from the outside world.

Flora has inherited the noblest bloodline of the High Elves. $B$From her description, it can easily tell that her mother is Dana. $B$$B$However, as to the identity of Flora's father, no one dares to talk about it, which seems to be taboo. $B$$B$Rhythm of the Lake is the aria that Dana played to lead elves and eradicate the Demongod, and before she sank into sleep, she passed it on to Flora.

skill1.name: Water Orbs
skill1.description: Attacks target enemy in the front row 5 times, each hit dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>70%</color> of ATK and increasing Magic DMG taken by the target by 8%, stacking up to 40%, for 10s.

skill2.name: Calling of the Elf
skill2.description: Restores all allies' Health equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK, and reduces all DMG taken by them by <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for 10s.

skill3.name: Memories of the Void
skill3.description: Has a 100% chance to cleanse negative effects from all allies when using Calling of the Elf.

46.title: Guard of Talon

backstory: An elite sorcerer from the Veaver Academy of the Kingdom of Lochaber.
She is the only daughter of the oldest distinguished family in the kingdom and has become one of the top sorcerers in the kingdom since she was a student.
Now as a teacher, she instructs her students in various types of magic.
Always wearing a smile and teaching gently in class, she is the most popular teacher at the academy.

47.name: Nocturna
47.title: Scarlet Moon

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory:
She is a vampire noble who lives in an abandoned castle. 

She looks young, but her actual age may be closer to one thousand years. 

No one dares to approach her, not to mention asking her age.

Deemed by the Holy Church as the oldest bloodsucker, she neither grows nor ages. 

She only comes out of the castle at night and appears in the Mistforest. 

No creature dares to come near when she is walking alone. 

On the night of the full moon, as her strength reaches its peak and her mood swings, she can no longer suppress her urge to suck blood so she will destroy all creatures in her path by feeding on every drop of their blood. 

Since she is aware of this, she tries to avoid going out at night on the full moon.

She attaches great importance to her aristocratic decency, as is shown in her gorgeous clothes and elegant manners, but she's still naive like a child. As long as you don't mess with her, you won't be in great danger.

She won't attack any creature first unless she's provoked first, which distinguishes her from other lower bloodsuckers. 

Eccentric as she is, she gets along very well with Ella and Metamorphoses and often goes out to play with them. 

Unlike Ella, Nocturna is careful and sensitive to the slight mood changes of Metamorphoses.

After eating an apple brought by Ella, she became obsessed with its sweet and sour taste. She tried to buy fruit in the market of the town but people there just ran off screaming when they saw her. 

She felt so irritated that she brought Metamorphoses along and sneaked into the town to feast in the fruit warehouse. 

Though she met with the opposition from Metamorphoses, she could care less because nothing was more important than having tasty apples. 

However, out of respect for Metamorphoses' feeling, she finally decided to stop sneaking. Instead, she asked Ella who can freely go to the human town to help her buy apples.

skill1.name: Scarlet Storm
skill1.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>60%</color> of ATK.

skill2.name: Aura of Night
skill2.description: For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for <color=#82C65D>20%</color> of the DMG dealt.

skill3.name: Eternal Night
skill3.description: Deals <color=#82C65D>2%</color> more damage with each attack. Can stack up to 40%.

special_equip.name: Scarlet Wish
special_equip.description: An essential for a noble lady when going out. Offers protection from sunburn.

48.name: Kyphon
48.title: Deliverer of the Underworld

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory:
She is the leader of the deliverers working at the entrance to the Underworld, but her behaviors make her unworthy of her title. 

Her main duty is to command her underlings to deliver wandering souls to the next life. 

If there are any defiled spirits nearby, she will use her giant scythe to destroy them without mercy.

Though wearing a serious look on her face, she is a careless girl, not active in her work at all. 

She often gets distracted and slacks off. Fortunately, her companions can always complete the work dutifully. 

Goorveig, in particular, does not like her lazy attitude and often criticizes her. However, Kyphon does not mind it at all.

A deliverer's duty is to guide ghosts to the next life, and prevent them from hurting the living. 

Her former companion Goorveig violated the duty and reaped the souls of the living. In order to hunt her down, Kyphon stepped into the Chrono Tower.

She is often reported by fellow deliverers for being lazy. But Acheronte, ruler of the Underworld doesn't punish her for that, and Kyphon herself is not willing to make any change. 

Sometimes, she can be found lying by the River of the Underworld and resting like there's no one around. 

Goorveig once made a detector that could wake up Kyphon as soon as it found her sleeping. But after Goorveig left there, Kyphon is back to lazy mode again.

"Oh? A new soul? Ah, never mind. I'll leave it to the others."

skill1.name: Dance of Finality
skill1.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>400%</color> of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.

skill2.name: Delivery to the Underworld
skill2.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>600%</color> of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. 
Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.

skill3.name: Restless
skill3.description: Enemies take <color=#82C65D>20%</color> more damage for 5 seconds.

special_equip.name: Ode to the End
special_equip.description: A symbol of the leader of Deliverers. The mere presence of this scythe alone strikes fear into others. It is said to be made by the Ruler of the Underworld.

49.name: Yurugu
49.title: Coffin of Voidness

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory:
She is a descendant of the Void Clan from the Space of Void, appearing no different from average humans. 

If anything, it may be their body size, much more petite than human's.
For thousands of years, the clan has been staying in the underground tombs, quietly guarding the Coffin of Voidness—the portal between the Space of Void and other parallel worlds.

Anyone who attempts to cross the Coffin of Voidness into the Space of Void will be attacked by Yurugu. It is a duty passed down through the centuries. That's truly all she knows.

No one can read her feelings, and no one that dares to provoke her can survive.

"I shall shower every void intruder with death equally."

Recently she has developed a great interest in pets since she stroked a cat covered with soft hair. 

She privately keeps a cat on the border of the Space of Void and often sneaks out of the underground tomb to play with the cat, which still remains a secret that hasn't been discovered by others of her clan.

skill1.name: Casket Defense
skill1.description: Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.

skill2.name: Void Surge
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.

skill3.name: Power of Void
skill3.description: Yurugu has a <color=#82C65D>20%</color> chance to fully restore her Health when it reaches 0.

51.name: Tuonel
51.title: Hybrid Healer

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory:
She is a shy girl, wielding a huge wand that is completely at odds with her petite figure. 

She is not only proficient in common healing magic, but also can use the forbidden magic that's only known by Night Clan. She can cure the wounds that are seemingly incurable for others. 

When others try to probe into her magic, Tuonel always wriggles out of giving a clear answer.

Tuonel is seen as a disgrace to her family. 

Her mother, the youngest daughter of the most powerful family in Chilora, accidentally saved a wounded fallen angel. The two fell in love and gave birth to an illegitimate child—Tuonel. 

Tuonel was disowned by her family and driven out of the house.

This little abandoned girl wandered alone until she was accepted by the Fallen Angels and eventually fit into the Night Clan. 

Unlike the rest of the clansmen, this descendant of a fallen angel never uses life-siphoning magic. 

To others' surprise, she heals all those injured equally, whether human or not.

She is reluctant to talk about her early childhood in Chilora or to reveal why she came to Cassiel. Luckily the villagers in the Lower Domain kindly accept her. 

As an apothecary, she enthusiastically helps the villagers and gradually integrates into their daily life. She is eager to make friends, and Nemesi is currently the top one on her willing-to-be-friends list.

skill1.name: Equal Healing
skill1.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of Tuonel's ATK and grants them a Shield that absorbs the same amount of damage for 5s.

skill2.name: Forbidden Dark Moon
skill2.description:
Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Tuonel's ATK per second for 10s, and places Nightwish on them for 10s.
Nightwish: Increases Dolls' ATK by <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Tuonel's ATK and damage dealt by 15%.

skill3.name: Child of Taboo
skill3.description: Generates 1 Chaos Energy every <color=#82C65D>2</color> seconds.

special_equip.name: Holy Forbiddenness
special_equip.description: Emits a warm, holy glow. Holds a mysterious forbidden power.

52.name: Yothaya
52.title: Petite Healer

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory:
She was born in Fomoire, an island in the west.

She inherited the bloodline of the Siam family, taking charge of the "Corrag (Finger)" among the Six Ovates.
Unlike other Ovate families, the Siam family gave up the pursuit of greater power. They only wish to use the healing magic at their fingertips to relieve the suffering of their people.

The good-natured Yothaya never gets into conflicts with others, nor even interacts much with them. 

Her only friends are Yui and Miku, and she always wants to dress as cute as they do. 

Her petite figure seems to fit into the cute clothing style.

At her age, the flowers, plants, insects, and butterflies in the fields are far more attractive than the complicated and tedious rituals. 

Therefore, she often skips some important rituals to go play in the forest. 

She recently has developed a strong interest in cooking. She makes a lot of strange dishes and asks Miku to have a taste of them. 

Though Miku doesn't like those dishes, she still struggles to finish them. This gives Yothaya a wrong impression that her cooking skill is getting better all the time. 

As her confidence gets boosted, she is thinking about giving her dishes to the Ovate Norn, but Miku has kept trying to stop her from doing that.

skill1.name: Calming
skill1.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.

skill2.name: Point Heal
skill2.description: Heals the front ally for <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.

skill3.name: Heart of Healer
skill3.description: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Yothaya's ATK every 5 seconds.

53.name: Ardisia
53.title: Beach Rambler

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: A young girl looking no different from human only appears by the sea.$B$$B$She often strolls on the beach before the low tide and picks up shells as gifts for others.

Ardisia was adopted by the Sea Elf in her childhood.$B$Her adoptive mother taught her how to breathe underwater. The ocean is her home.$B$$B$Far away from the humans, Ardisia knows nothing about the dangers of the outside world.
As long as the weather is clear, Ardisia will definitely come to the beach for a walk.$B$$B$As the sun sets and the sky darkens,$B$she will make a silent maiden's wish to the shooting stars.
It is said that her adoptive mother,$B$$B$the Sea Elf, hates humans so much.$B$When a boy attempts to approach Ardisia,$B$the calm ocean will churn, as if to engulf the frivolous boy.

skill1.name: Healing Wave
skill1.description: Grants a shield that absorbs damage equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to all allies for 10 seconds. While the shield persists, Ardisia restores Health equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK every second.

skill2.name: Wishing
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies. Also increases all allies' Magic DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>10%</color>, with a bonus increase of <color=#82C65D>10%</color> for every point of Order Energy owned, for 10 seconds.

skill3.name: Ebb And Flow
skill3.description:
Upon taking damage, restores all allies' Health equal to 100% of ATK, with a cooldown of <color=#82C65D>5</color> seconds.
After using the skill of Wishing twice, summons tides to deal Magic DMG equal to 100% of ATK to all enemies, and increases the Magic DMG they take by <color=#82C65D>15%</color> for 10 seconds, stacking up to 2 times.

special_equip.name: Sea Whisper
special_equip.description: A never wilting flower that Ardisia occasionally wears in her hair. It's always silent there listening to the maiden's wishes.

54.name: Garditis
54.title: Poet of Paradise

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: He was the gatekeeper of the Sanctuary and the older brother of Afallen and Parfait. $B$$B$However, he was not interested in his work at all, but absorbed himself in composing music.

Although not interested in his work, he was somehow trusted by the Protector. $B$$B$One day, Garditis left the Sanctuary for the reason that this place is lacking in creative inspiration. $B$$B$According to his own words, his best piece was finished by the Elf Lakeside.

Garditis has become a bard in the Lower Domain, playing his favorite melodies for all to hear. $B$$B$Unlike other noble sorcerers of the Upper Domain, Garditis has a very good relationship with the inhabitants of the Lower Domain and even invites them to perform with him.

Someone has seen him several times in the Forest of Elves, but each time he only wandered at the entrance to the forest and did not step in, as if an invisible wall existed. $B$$B$It seems Mayahuel hates him a lot. She will scold and throw him out whenever she sees him approaching the Forest of Elves.

skill1.name: Healing Concerto
skill1.description: The Song of Healing heals the whole team for <color=#82C65D>80%</color> of Garditis's ATK and increases Garditis's max Health by <color=#82C65D>20%</color>. Lasts for 5s.

skill2.name: Notes of Cleansing
skill2.description: Removes debuffs from all allies, and grants immunity to debuffs for <color=#82C65D>5</color> seconds.

skill3.name: Celestial Music
skill3.description: Immune to debuffs after using Healing Concerto, for 2s <color=#82C65D>(4s at Evolve 1)</color>.

special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

55.name: Inn & Lou
55.title: Twin Executors

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory:
Inn and Lou are twin sisters. They were born in the Sanctuary, but due to their poor magic talent, they were regarded by the Ruler of the Sanctuary as defectives.

Naturally, they were treated coldly by other people there. These two sisters endured the pain they should not have suffered at their age.

The twins struggled to survive in the corners of the Sanctuary. And the day finally came for them to meet the turning point in their lives.

Due to the monster invasion and the intensified conflicts between the Upper and Lower Domain, the Protector decided to make some use of the useless twins. She gave the twins the most humble work in the Sanctuary.

The so-called work is actually some shady work to deal with lower-class civilians or lower-level monsters. It didn't need too much magic to deal with those, after all.

As if a ray of sunlight shot into the darkness, Inn and Lou came out of the shadows and became honored residents of Sanctuary who could serve the Protector.

They have no thoughts of their own, but mechanically carry out the orders from the Protector, eliminating the targets on the list, and then moving on to the next.

The sisters' petite figures are their best cover. No one would have guessed that the seemingly innocent twins are the most cold-blooded assassins.

The two of them have an amazingly destructive power that does not match their appearance at all. When together, Inn and Lou never fail an assassination.

Here they got another order from the Protector. This time the target is the leader of the Alliance of the Rebellions.

skill1.name: Thorn of Binding
skill1.description: Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>80%</color> of ATK. If Inn is the executor, deals 20% more Physical DMG; if Lou is the executor, reduces the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 50%.

skill2.name: Pain
skill2.description:
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. Also places Pain on the target for 6s. 
Pain: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Inn & Lou's ATK per second.

skill3.name: Precise Execution
skill3.description: Increases damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> every 20 seconds. Can stack up to 50%.

special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

56.name: Amanami
56.title: Princess of the Sun

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory:
The princess of Sunrise Island in the far east.

Her mother is the queen that rules over this land.

Her elegancy can be found in her every move.
Regarded as the successor of the Living God, she has been receiving an elite education from a young age. Study politics, etiquette, and various conjuring.

Every year, she offers a dance at the Kami Festival. Spectators marvel at the softness and elegance of her dance "Seigaiha." 

It is said only the true successor can learn it. 

The dance is like the ripples of a vast ocean, representing the God's grace, omnipresent and boundless. 

As a successor, Talhae will incorporate the people's prayers for peace and blessings for the future into the dance, and offer it to the God who blesses the land.

Although she is a princess envied by all, privately she hates to be confined to the palace. She wishes to go outside to play. 

She often leans on the handrail and wonders, "What is the outside world like?" 

Yet she is not permitted to have much contact with the outside, which makes her very distressed. 

When her inner distress cannot be solved, she often practices dancing in the courtyard. 

As Talhae starts dancing, all the red leaves fall from her head with the wind, as if they are retreating for knowing they could not compete with her beauty. Whoever sees this scene will be impressed by her otherworldly beauty.

skill1.name: Radiant Wheel
skill1.description: Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>430%</color> of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.

skill2.name: Seigaiha
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.

skill3.name: Kalavin
skill3.description: Increases all allies' damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for 5s. Can stack up to 40%.

special_equip.name: Skyroar
special_equip.description: A ceremonial object used to celebrate the coming of spring. When Amanami holds this light and elegant fan, it makes her more adorable than she already is.

57.name: Avil
57.title: Guard of the Royal Capital

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory:
As the captain of the Royal Guard of Belgica, Avil was referred to as the "Iron Wall". 

He was responsible for maintaining the security of Belgica.

Though loyal to the royal court of Belgica, he utterly detested the ostentatious lifestyle of those aristocrats. 

He was strict with his men and himself in discipline and bent on restoring the former glory of the royal court.

He wouldn't tolerate anyone who broke the rule, especially those violating the law. 

Whether the troublemakers were peasants or nobles, he showed no mercy and treated them equally without discrimination.

He once served as the vanguard captain during the invasion of the Kingdom of Celtica. And he was court-martialed for his refusal to carry out an order to burn a village. 

Instead of being convicted, his integrity won him the appreciation of the royal family. 

Avil was then transferred away from the front line to serve as the captain of the Royal Guard.

skill1.name: Guard
skill1.description: Increases Physical DEF by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> for 5 seconds, during which all damage taken by allies are redirected to Avil.

skill2.name: Unbending Will
skill2.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.2s, then places Mind Blur on them for 10s. 
Mind Blur: Reduces Physical DEF by 5% of Avil's Physical DEF each time the inflicted enemies take damage. Can stack up to 100%.

skill3.name: Hold Ground
skill3.description: Takes 10% less damage.

59.name: Luan
59.title: Vermilion Phoenix

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory:
She is the most popular maiden of Rumni, the Land of the Sunfaith. 

Gorgeously dressed and elegantly behaved, she is considered the daughter of a great nobleman by others.

She uses a long-lost magic that burns as brightly as the sun. 

People often see her as a symbol of light.

She calls herself Luan, the same name as the legendary sacred bird that symbolizes the sun. 

The bird can be reborn in fire no matter what harm it suffers. 

People often regard her as the maiden guarding Rumni and the reincarnation of the sacred bird. 

However, she has never admitted this. Rather than responding to people's expectations, Luan prefers to play freely, tread lightly on the earth, walk on the wind, and dance among the clouds.

She likes playing with kids and believes all of them will have a bright future where they can make a splash just like her. 

Once, someone who was up to no good approached Luan and said with an evil smile, "Since you like kids a lot, how about having a baby by yourself?" 

But soon he paid the price for his rudeness. The maiden before him was no more the one that always wore a smile. 

In a few days, a person in rags was found lying on the roadside out of the town, whose face was too badly battered to be recognized and whose body had suffered masses of burns and fractures. People could only tell he was still alive from his shallow breathing.

skill1.name: Vermilion Feather
skill1.description:
For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing.
Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores <color=#82C65D>10%</color> of max Health per second.

skill2.name: Flaming Phoenix
skill2.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s.
Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.

skill3.name: Rebirth
skill3.description: Revives automatically after death. Increases ATK, Physical DEF and Magic DEF by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and restores <color=#82C65D>10%</color> of max Health per second for 10s. Can only trigger once per combat.

61.name: Yui
61.title: Demonsbane Spear

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory:
Yui is a young girl from Fomoire Island. Born in Olíndic Family, she inherits the power of the Legendary Beast. 

She is one of the Six Ovates but has the lowest status among them.

She has a younger twin sister.

Though she seldom mentions her sister, she seems to love her sister dearly. 

She is being quite protective of her sister. Once someone suspicious comes near, she will lift her spear without hesitation.

As an Ovate, her responsibility is to guard the Island and wipe out any intruder. 

To be as powerful as other Ovates, she followed Flare, the Priestess of Irminsul, to train herself. 

When the training is done, she becomes a master in the family spearplay skills passed down through generations. Not only that, but she also became proficient in all kinds of conjuring.

When in combat, she stabs at the enemy with a conjuring-converged spear 

Meanwhile, she summons the Legendary Beast, which can enhance the strength of her body.

"The Demonsbane Spear is not sharpened to slay evil, but to bring peace to this world."

skill1.name: Demonsbane Spear
skill1.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK to a single target and dispels all of their buffs.

skill2.name: Dance of Legendary Beast
skill2.description:
Reduces damage taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and increases Demonsbane Spear damage by 50%. Yui also enters Soulbreaker status. 
Soulbreaker: Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing damage equal to <color=#82C65D>235%</color> of Yui's ATK.

skill3.name: Spear Princess
skill3.description: Reduces Magic DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>20%</color>. Also ignores the enemy's Physical DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Yui's ATK for 10s after using Demonsbane Spear.

special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

62.name: Nasha
62.title: Scarce Mage

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: A mage from the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North, hailed as the "Scarce Mage".$B$$B$She's able to cast long-lost forbidden magic.

She owes her strong magic power to the pact she made with the demons.$B$$B$The pact binds her to always protect the offspring of the demons—that is, the royal family of the Principality of Holmgard. Hence she's also titled "Defender of the Far North".
Being a tutor for the royal family, she has finer taste than most people. Her noble status is revealed in the way she dresses.

Her true passion lies in the study of magic. She spends most of her time in her yard, researching those long-lost magic spells.$B$$B$
Of her two students, Princess Lilia and La Crima, she seems to favor the latter. She has taught La Crima every Gem Magic spell she knows and often takes her to her tea parties.

63.name: Nannar
63.title: Guard of the Mirror

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: The Void Clan is responsible for guarding the Space of Void. $B$So the majority of them would like to act aggressively and expel all intruders. $B$$B$However, Nannar is always flinching, unlike others. $B$She wears a lot of layers of clothes to cover more of herself, hoping to avoid being noticed by others.

Although she looks vulnerable, she actually is the descendant of the Void Clan.$B$The magic within her is beyond imagination. $B$$B$The clan has been guarding the portal into the Space of Void alone for thousands of years. $B$Therefore, Nannar has never had a chance to talk with people from the outside worlds.
As soon as she sees a stranger, she will hide herself in the Mirror World immediately. $B$She won't come out until the stranger leaves.

She is into cooking but it really bothers her that she can't find anyone to taste her cuisines. $B$$B$Compared with directly talking to others, she prefers to sneak a peek first. $B$When she confirms the one is harmless, she will show up.$B$$B$
"Who are you? I don't know much about the outside world. $B$I was just sleeping inside the mirror."

skill1.name: Guard of the Mirror
skill1.description: Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.

skill2.name: Curse of the Mirror
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>150%</color> of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.

skill3.name: Reflection of the Mirror
skill3.description: When taking damage, there is a <color=#82C65D>20%</color> chance to trigger Curse of the Mirror. The effect can only be triggered once in 2s.

special_equip.name: Multiglory
special_equip.description: A magical mirror that reflects people's hidden desires. It's said that no amount of force can break it.

64.name: Isabel
64.title: Executor of the Ideal Grace

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Isabel, growing up in a convent, was deemed as a potential assassin by the Chief Inquisitor when she was only four or five years old, and then was taken back to the Inquisition, where she started learning to spread the ideal grace in some strange way—assassination.

With a pious bone in her body, Isabel has been convinced that everything she does is to better spread the ideal grace. She believes that those killed are not really dead, but just exchange their physical demise for spiritual salvation.

When executing the ideal grace, she always puts on an innocent look, which allows her to easily approach her targets. When they let their guard down, she will mercilessly terminate their life while praying devoutly that their spirits could be saved.

Rumor has it that the forbidden magic reappears in the Chrono Tower. After hearing that, the Holy Church seeks help from the Inquisition and has Isabel work for it, outwardly claiming that Isabel would assist the Preacher in search of the Sacred Relic. But the truth is that Isabe is ordered to terminate all those trying to engage in the forbidden magic.

skill1.name: Break Free
skill1.description: The hook pierces through the ground and attacks the target in the back row, dealing damage equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK and dispelling the target's buffs.

skill2.name: Suffered
skill2.description: Consumes all the existing Chaos Energy to hit the target in the back row 5 times, each hit dealing damage equal to <color=#82C65D>260%</color> of ATK. With every one extra point of Chaos Energy consumed, each hit deals bonus damage equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Ideal Grace
skill3.description: Each time Isabel casts Break Free, increases Isabel's Crit Chance by 7.5% for <color=#82C65D>10s</color>, stacking up to 5 times.

special_equip.name: Fadeless
special_equip.description: A weapon wielded by Isabel only when there is salvation needed. It always fulfills its commitment, that's for sure.

65.name: La Crima
65.title: Tear of Gems

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory:
She is a young girl born in a collateral branch of the royal family from the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North. She inherits the royal bloodline just like Lilia. 

With outstanding magic power, she serves as a disciple of the Scarce Mage Nasha.

Unlike her mentor, she retains the heart of a virtuous maiden. 

She's cute and gentle, but sometimes quite clumsy. She often falls into emotional fits of self-blame for making too many mistakes.

However, Nasha loves this disciple so much that she decided to teach Gem Magic to this weeping child. 

Only the tears of a kind-hearted maiden can condense into magic quartz and the tears also serve as the very medium for releasing higher Gem Magic. 

After mastering the delicate Gem Magic, La Crima remains unchanged, still a timid girl who won't take the initiative to attack others with magic.

When she was a child, she had witnessed that her parents were drawn into the disputes over the royal succession and reduced to death so she was afraid of interacting with others and often made strange sounds alone. 

Her mentor Nasha used to help her learn how to fit in the society but the several attempts all ended in failure. 

Born in a collateral branch of the royal family, La Crima lived in a castle of the capital and was required to attend social gatherings. A person who has anthropophobia is apparently unable to adapt to such an environment so she sneaked out of the castle. 

Someone said she showed up on the tundra of Snegurochka and it's also said the Frost Chivalric Order is looking for her. 

Personally she is not willing to have too much contact with others so she may be hiding in a corner and immersed in her own world at this moment.

skill1.name: Barrier of Gems
skill1.description:
Generates 1 Order Energy, heals the front Doll for <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK, and applies Pearl Shower to the Doll for 10s.
Pearl Shower: Restores Health equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of La Crima's ATK per second, and reduces damage taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

skill2.name: Sparkle
skill2.description: Unleashes the blinding light inside the gem, dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemies and stunning them for 1s. Enemies take <color=#82C65D>30%</color> more Magic DMG for the next 10 seconds.

skill3.name: Tear of Pearl
skill3.description: When taking damage, there is a 20% chance to restore 1 Order Energy. Can be triggered again after <color=#82C65D>1</color> second.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

66.name: Hauen
66.title: Rabbit of Fairyland

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: A girl who claims to be from Fairyland on the edge of the Kingdom of Lochaber. A mythical figure from fairytales. She is leaving home for the first time, and is curious about what lies beyond.

Her small stature and cute-looking wand often cause her to be mistaken for a child, but she doesn't mind. It appears that Hauen is not her real name, but one given to her by her companions in the Fairyland. Everyone around her feels indebted to her because she always brings them luck.
Despite her curiosity about this new world, she has no experience dealing with people and is too shy to speak in front of strangers.

She used to be a cute white rabbit from Fairyland. Even though she has taken a human form now, her long rabbit ears would still protrude from her head whenever she feels frightened, and then she would quickly hide in a corner, burying her head in her arms, trembling. Recently, however, she seems to have made her first friend in the outside world and is often seen playing with Ardisia.

skill1.name: Rabbit's blessing
skill1.description: Grants the ally with the lowest HP a <color=#82C65D>4</color>-second invincibility

skill2.name: Fairyland
skill2.description: Dispels buffs from all enemy targets, then reduces their Magic DEF by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of self's ATK for 10 seconds

skill3.name: Reversed Vision
skill3.description: Rabbit's blessing applies to all allies, boosting their damage by <color=#82C65D>60%</color> for 10 seconds

special_equip.name: Key of Fantasy
special_equip.description: Hauen has always been guarding the beautiful dreams of every child

67.name: Parfait
67.title: Punisher of Holiness

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: One of the twin gatekeepers of the Sanctuary. Parfait always patrols the gate of the Sanctuary in high spirits while grumbling at her elder sister Afallen who often loafs on the job.$B$After her unreliable brother Garditis left Sanctuary, she decided to replace him to guard the Sanctuary.

No one dares to intrude on the Sanctuary so Parfait has a lot of leisure time. $B$She doesn't go out for fun like Afallen but uses her excess psychic power to produce dessert and snacks. $B$Her snacks have never been out of stock and she is quite willing to share her newly-invented snacks with others.

The huge dessert staff, far exceeding her height, is said to be capable of casting a powerful magic that no barrier can resist. $B$$B$However, no one seems to be afraid of the staff because its cute shape always makes people laugh.

If she uses her staff to attack her sister's omni-absorbing pillow, what will happen? $B$It's a question without an answer. $B$$B$The two sisters seem close and often play around in the garden of the Sanctuary. $B$$B$"Fighting is strictly forbidden!"

skill1.name: Punishment
skill1.description:
Hits a single enemy with Physical DMG equal to<color=#82C65D>400%</color> of self's ATK while inflicting Honey Trap on the target for 10s.
Honey Trap: The inflicted gets addicted to Parfait's candy and takes <color=#82C65D>30%</color> more Physical DMG. Stacks up to 2 times.
When Parfait is in the Satiation status, this skill acts on all enemies instead of a single enemy target; it cleanses allies' debuffs and dispels enemies' buffs.

skill2.name: Burp
skill2.description:
Parfait feels very content after gobbling up a load of desserts and applies the Satiation status to herself for 20s. Using the skill repeatedly will reset the status duration.
Satiation: Normal Attack now targets all enemies and ignores Physical DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of self's ATK.

skill3.name: Blessing of Holiness
skill3.description: Reduces the damage Parfait takes by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and allows her to recover HP equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of her ATK every time she takes damage.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

68.name: Dorin
68.title: Celestial Gift

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: Born into nobility, Dorin has had a keen interest in magic since her childhood and became a genius in the eyes of others. $B$$B$Her father, an earl advanced in years, cherished this little daughter so he hired a famed sorcerer from Upper Domain to help her practice magic.

As she grew up, Dorin was no longer content to just learn from books. $B$$B$In spite of the opposition from her master, she built her own magic workshop and started conducting magic experiments, something she had long since hoped to do.

Straying from traditional magic research, Dorin took a whimsical approach to her experiments: she developed a potion used to boost magic and directly ran tests on herself. $B$$B$The old earl was very concerned and had tried time and again to stop his daughter's risky project. $B$$B$However, Dorin brushed off her father's opposition. For her, the excitement of exploring the unknown far outweighed the risk.

Recently, Dorin developed an obsession with magic puppets. She took to spending all night in her workshop building new puppets.$B$$B$The earl, in an attempt to change his daughter's lifestyle and get her out of the workshop, decided to let her host the Dazzling Stage contest.

skill1.name: Mysterious Giftbox
skill1.description: Dorin throws a giftbox, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to all enemies after the explosion. And all enemy units take 20% more damage for 10s.

skill2.name: Careful Preparation
skill2.description: Makes careful preparations before sending the giftbox, increasing all allies' ATK by <color=#82C65D>40%</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> for 10s.

skill3.name: Attack Reinforce
skill3.description: Increases base ATK by 5% <color=#82C65D>(10% at Evolve 1)</color>

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

69.name: Mayahuel
69.title: Forest Blessing

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory:
She used to be the maid of Dana, Goddess of the Lake. 

Before Dana fell into a deep sleep, she was given the task of guarding the Forest of Elves. 

She has much respect for Dana. For thousands of years, she has been following Dana's instructions to guard the peace of the Forest of Elves.

Proficient in natural magic, she has no mercy for intruders who dare to disturb the forest. 

If you just enter the forest with no malicious intent, you will be spared from her fury. However, all males are forbidden to enter the forest. 

Someone witnessed that she attacked Garditis who tried to trespass on the forest and even disregarded her identity of High Elf to severely scold Garditis.

She takes great care of Flora, and often teaches Flora new tunes although she is not good at composing music herself. 

According to Mineer's proof, it seems that someone comes to the Forest of Elves regularly to pass on new songs to Mayahuel.

Mayahuel liked a human male before but unexpectedly the one she revered most also liked this man, so she chose to quit and wish them happiness. 

Yet this relationship didn't last long as the human male deserted his lover and left the forest. 

Mayahuel was there to witness all so she started to hate all males and pledged that no male would be allowed to set food on Forest of Elves.

skill1.name: Storm of Nature
skill1.description: Summons the Storm of Nature that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK.

skill2.name: Starlight Wrath
skill2.description:
Summons the Power of Stars, dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> ATK 3 times to a random target and applies Soul Disperse to the enemy for 10s.
Soul Disperse: Reduces Magic DEF by 5% of Mayahuel's ATK, up to 50%.

skill3.name: Natural Law
skill3.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of ATK.

special_equip.name: Staff of Promise
special_equip.description: A memento given to Mayahuel by Dana, the Goddess of the Lake. Holds the power to manipulate the growth of all trees.

70.name: Mineer
70.title: Blessing of the Night

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: Living on the shore of Elf Lakeside, she often spends her nights quietly bathing in the moonlight by the Lake and praying to Dana, Goddess of the Lake who guarded Elf Lake before.

Dana, who slumbers in the depths of the Elf Lake, sensed her devotion. The Goddess conjured the moonlight on the lake into the form of a dolphin. Then she bestowed on her the dolphin along with the ability to manipulate the moonlight. 

In the moonlight, Mineer could feel the connection with Goddess of the Lake. 

While the Goddess slumbers, she maintains the peace of the Forest of Elves with her companion, waiting for the Goddess to awaken.

She often plays with Flora by the lake and meanwhile shoulders the responsibility of keeping Flora safe. 

Anyone who attempts to approach Flora with ill intentions will be sanctioned by her powerful magic.

Both Mineer and Mayahuel know Dana's romance story with the human male. 

Unlike Mayahuel, Mineer seems to know the real reason why the human male finally left Dana. 

Thus she privately keeps in touch with that man. He delivers the latest news of the outside to her, including some new songs. 

Mayahuel knows nothing about this and even teaches the songs to Flora. 

Mineer's elegant manners often lead to an illusion that she has good taste in music, but actually, she is a poor learner in music. 

Each time she offers the new song to Mayahuel, she has to clumsily avoid Mayahuel's questions, with an entirely different face from usual. 

Luckily Mayahuel is not very suspicious but just curious why Mineer can always discover such great pieces of music.

skill1.name: Overflowing Magic
skill1.description: Consumes all Order Energy to attack a single target repeatedly (based on the energy cost). The first attack deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>150%</color> of Mineer's ATK and each subsequent attack deals 7% more damage.

skill2.name: Moonlight
skill2.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to a single target and applies a Magic Spread effect to the target for 5 seconds.
Magic Spread: When attacked by Mineer, the target takes extra Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Mineer's ATK.

skill3.name: Waxing Moon
skill3.description: When dealing damage, there is a <color=#82C65D>15%</color> chance to generate 1 Order Energy and increase damage dealt by 20% for 5s.

special_equip.name: Palemoon
special_equip.description: A piece of jewelry handed down over generations of elves. Said to hold the power of moonlight.

71.name: Matveiffe
71.title: Blue Shift Watcher

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory:
Unlike the many courtières and socialites of Muntenian royalty, Matveiffe preferred her peace and quiet out on deserted balconies and gardens. She spent many nights staring into space, enraptured by the stars in the sky.
Those around her gossiped behind her back, pointing out her antisocial tendencies, but Matveiffe herself paid them no mind.
