One day, Matveiffe heard the call of a mysterious voice. "Join us, young one. Here, you will come to know the truth of the world."
Fascinated by the unknown, she left home without a word, following the mysterious voice calling her to adventure.

After Matveiffe's disappearance, people guessed at where she had gone; lost in the wildnerness on a stargazing trip gone awry, or eloped with some peasant boy in the country. They soon put the strange stargazing girl out of their minds.
Several years later, Matveiffe's return sent shockwaves through Muntenia. She was, however, no longer the same stargazing girl they once knew. Her cold gaze belied her perception of the frequencies that bound all things, and her manipulation of those same frequencies to warp, crush and otherwise destroy everything she laid eyes on.

The Muntenian leadership quickly found Matveiffe. They had been desperate to find anything or anyone that could stand up to the monster of Pannonia—the Annihilator of Existence. And in Matveiffe, they found their answer.
"The mind is prone to deviate. All I do is correct it, while creating new deviations."

skill1.name: Blueshift
skill1.description: Increases Crit Chance by 5% for 10s, stacking up to 5 times. Dispels all Buffs on the enemy in the back row and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK to the target.

skill2.name: Unleash the Void
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>90%</color> of ATK 6 times to the enemy in the back row, with each attack reducing the target's Crit DMG Resistance by 7%. Increases self Crit DMG by the sum of the target's reduced Crit Resistance for 10s. After the 6 attacks, deals extra Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>120%</color> of ATK to the target.

skill3.name: Netherswap
skill3.description: During combat, ignores <color=#82C65D>4000</color> points of each enemy's Physical DEF.

special_equip.name: Paradox
special_equip.description: Cognitive biases often lead to paradoxes. This is the problem Matveiffe is going to tackle.

72.name: Sher
72.title: Wanderer of Fate

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: Kind though she is, Sher doesn't like to interact with others too much. $B$$B$She's not from the Sanctuary but appreciated by the Sanctuary for her powerful magic. $B$$B$That's why as an outsider, she doesn't get rejected by others.

She called herself Sher. It's said she was forced to come here because of her hard fate. $B$$B$Some rumors say she is an arch-sorcerer fleeing from certain sins, while others say she is an elven princess from a decayed kingdom. $B$But there is no definite answer, as she always keeps her distance from others, keeping her past well hidden.

She has stayed in the chapel of the Sanctuary for nearly a century. $B$$B$Witnesses claim that she occasionally speaks to herself in an exotic language, with no intention to be understood by others. $B$$B$She is an old acquaintance with Acheronte, who once revealed that Sher was not her real name. $B$$B$However, even the haughty ruler of the River of the Underworld uses honorifics when mentioning Sher, which shows the nobility of her origins.　$B$$B$
"If't be true the one whom I behold up to finally receive the gift of heaven and cleanse the sins of divination, mine own soul may eke grise into the final chapt'r of destiny." $B$$B$— Acheronte

It seems she also knows Akasha, Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, and Dana, Goddess of the Lake. Both of whom are only recorded in the legend, so people speculate that Sher must have also lived for ages. According to Kyphon, Sher used to be the ruler of the Underworld prior to Acheronte. But for some reason, she left there and became the Wanderer of Fate.

skill1.name: Light of Creation
skill1.description: Restores all allies' Health equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK, and grants them a shield that blocks 1 instance of DMG, which lasts for 10 seconds.

skill2.name: Spirit Prayer
skill2.description:
Restores all allies' Health equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK, increases allied dolls' Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Sher's Crit Chance, and applies the Fate's Blessing effect to all allies, for 10 seconds.
Fate's Blessing: Whenever an allied doll deals DMG, increase their Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>3%</color> for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20 times.

skill3.name: Chthonic Incarnation
skill3.description: For the next 10 seconds, allied dolls increase their DMG dealt and Health restoration by <color=#82C65D>2%</color> whenever they crit, stacking up to <color=#82C65D>40%</color>.

special_equip.name: Destiny Reveal
special_equip.description: A magical item that can manifest the past and guide the future. It is said that Sher always carries it around.

73.name: Ruda
73.title: Starlight Collector

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: She is a sorcerer from the Kingdom of Lochaber. $B$$B$She can absorb the magic power from the stars and use it to heal the sick.
Self-assured for her beauty, she takes others' admiration for granted. $B$$B$She quite enjoys the feeling of being flattered.

To resupply the power of her magic, she often climbs to the mountain top at night to collect the magic power of the stars. $B$$B$Rumors say that such power is the key to her beauty. $B$$B$However, all who try to copy her every move end up with a blank.

She hates being touched by others. $B$$B$According to her, the power of stars is attached to her skin. $B$$B$Anyone who touches her skin will take away the magic, which will cause her skin to age. $B$$B$However, skin aging shouldn't be a problem for a maiden like her.

skill1.name: Starsurge
skill1.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>240%</color> of ATK.

skill2.name: Starfall
skill2.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. 
Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Ruda's ATK.

skill3.name: Collect
skill3.description: When using skills, there is a<color=#82C65D>20%</color> chance to generate 1 Chaos Energy.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

74.name: Hilda
74.title: The Royal Sword

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: She is the captain of the Royal Guard of Lochaber. $B$$B$Her loyalty to the royal family of Lochaber is absolute. $B$$B$Anyone that tends to threaten the royal family will face her blades.

Maiden as she is, her authority is respected by all royal soldiers. Even the generals won't take her suggestions lightly. $B$$B$She prefers using the double swords in her hands to subdue the opponent rather than using the words to convince them. $B$$B$She believes guarding Lochaber is the ultimate glory worth dying for.

She was born the princess of Lochaber, who has the right to the throne. $B$$B$But she gave up the luxury life as a princess and chose to guard the royal family with her own hands. $B$$B$She earned the admiration among the soldiers, who would identify her orders as those from the throne.

With a royal background, she was very arrogant. She once had the attitude that she would only wield her sword to prove her prowess. $B$$B$Once on a quest, her arrogance led her into the enemies' trap. She got rescued later, but her companion, who was also her best friend, was killed during the action. $B$$B$This was a heavy hit to Hilda, which led her started to reflect on her reckless behaviors. To pass on her friend's will, she carries her friend's sword on the waist and swears that her swords will only be drawn to protect.

skill1.name: Wind Storm
skill1.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>400%</color> of ATK to all enemies

skill2.name: Lion's Agility
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>240%</color> of ATK to all enemies and increases the damage of the next skill by 100%.

skill3.name: Royal Glory
skill3.description: When used, all enemies take <color=#82C65D>15%</color> more damage for 5s.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

75.name: Fey
75.title: Penetrating Spear

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: A leading warrior in the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church, who disdains worldly entanglements and dedicates everything to the martial arts.

Unlike other heavy chevaliers in the order, she never wears heavy armor due to her focus on agility and mobility. 

She always rushes into the battlefield like a gale with her magic spear in hand and uses overwhelming strength to take out all enemies in her path.
By order of the Holy Church, Fey led the members of the Chivalric Order to form an expedition into the Chrono Tower.

The chevaliers fought bravely against the monsters but gradually fell one by one due to exhaustion, with only Fey holding out till the very last. 

In the face of waves of monsters, Fey, calm and steady, with her spear in hand, carried out her duty till the last minute.

skill1.name: Sweep
skill1.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK to a single target.

skill2.name: Magic Flux
skill2.description: Activates the spell on the spear. Normal Attacks turn into consecutive thrusts, dealing extra damage equal to <color=#82C65D>90%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Penetrate
skill3.description: Deals <color=#82C65D>10%</color> more damage.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

76.name: Mortimer
76.title: Heart of Rose

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory:
She used to be the director of the largest garden in Lunia. 

The plants in the garden piqued her interest more than humans.

In the moonlit nights, the garden was silent, only Mortimer laying alone amongst the flowers. 

Entangled by the thorns, she absorbed the essence of the roses, which could be turned into her magic.

When Lunia was once again in the throes of war, Princess Eulalia traveled around to help the civilians who had suffered during the war. 

Mortimer's unique healing magic was appreciated by Eulalia, and so she was invited to join Eulalia to save the injured that blanketed the war-torn land.

Mortimer herself certainly enjoyed the travels, which gave her more opportunities to get close to nature and absorb the essence of flowers. 

Despite being called the "Thorny Rose" by some, most people know this mischievous child as a helpful and gentle girl and called her "Heart of Rose". 

Together with Eulalia, she is seen as a gift from God to the land of Lunia.

skill1.name: Whisper of Flower
skill1.description: Use rose petals to heal the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Mortimer's ATK.

skill2.name: A Girl's Prayer
skill2.description: Reduces the damage taken by the Doll in the front row by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and increases that Doll's ATK by <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Mortimer's ATK. Lasts for 10s.

skill3.name: Delicate Hands
skill3.description: Auto uses Whisper of Flower once on allies that are below 30% Health. Can only trigger once every <color=#82C65D>8</color> seconds.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

78.name: Suigetsu
78.title: Midsummer Dream

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Hailing from Sunrise Island in the east, Suigetsu is a complete departure from the dignified ladies people have come to expect from the Island. Jovial, outgoing, and entirely unflappable, Suigetsu loves making new friends.

In the waters south of Sunrise Island, there is a nameless island, where Sea Elves are said to surface.$B$$B$When the adventurous Suigetsu heard the news from the caravan, she seemed ready and primed for another fun and playful adventure.

When the right seafaring weather finally came, Suigetsu, who had already prepared for the long journey, packed her luggage and boarded the merchant ship that brought the news.$B$$B$Although the captain reminded her that they had no intention to linger, which meant that Suigetsu would have to explore the island alone.$B$$B$Suigetsu didn't care that one bit. As long as she could reach the island, she would be satisfied.

The nameless island gradually coming into the view of Suigetsu, the merchant ship would soon dock.$B$$B$The weather was clear and sunny, perfect for an adventure.$B$$B$Still on the ship, the captain repeatedly warned Suigetsu of the dangers ahead, but all this did not dampen Suigetsu's spirits. She was confident in her expertise and her ability to protect herself.$B$$B$The captain, knowing that nothing can dissuade her, said his farewells and sailed away.$B$$B$As the mast disappeared over the horizon, Suigetsu took her first steps on the adventure she had pined after for so long.

skill1.name: Undertow
skill1.description: Grants immunity to one instance of damage, and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to a single enemy target. Increases ATK by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>, and reduces DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> for 10 seconds.

skill2.name: Crestfall
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to a single enemy target, and inflicts Stun on the target for 2 seconds.

skill3.name: Rise and Fall
skill3.description: Increase Suigetsu's base ATK by <color=#82C65D>2%</color> every 3 seconds, stacking up to 20 times.

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

79.name: Symbriette
79.title: Sea Guardian

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: A mysterious woman who only appears at the shore during summer. Clad in an exotic swimsuit, she frolics in the water as if there is no one around.$B$$B$In the presence of strangers, she becomes self-conscious and distant.$B$$B$She is rumored to be an elf tasked with guarding the ocean, but no one can be sure.$B$$B$She always darts away and swims out into the deep the moment someone strikes up a conversation.

Symbriette wasn't much of a conversationalist.$B$$B$Some have said that her shy and introverted nature has led to a natural fear of socialization. Others have guessed at some major trauma from a past attempt to connect with someone, leaving wounds that still haven't healed. Some even say that she only speaks some unknown Elven tongue, and is incapable of communicating with humans.

Symbriette's mother once told her a story about clear bottles filled with sand, dropped on the beach by visiting Sea Elves. It is said that those who collected these bottles would be richly rewarded by the Sea Elves.$B$$B$Insisting on the truth behind the legend, Symbriette often paces the beach in the hopes of finding one such bottle.

Though honored to be named the creatures in her wildest dreams, Symbriette was nonetheless shocked by her moniker of "Sea Elf". The Sea Elves, if they did exist, were shrouded in mystery.$B$$B$If they did turn up, Symbriette would be first in line to visit them.

skill1.name: Pelagic Aegis
skill1.description: Grants a shield that absorbs damage equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Symbriette's Max Health to all allies, and increases their Physical DEF and Magic DEF by 5% of her Max Health for 10 seconds.

skill2.name: Tidal Clarion
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Symbriette's Max Health to all enemies, and causes them to take extra Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>5%</color> of her Max Health whenever they take Magic DMG for 10 seconds.

skill3.name: Intrepid Heart
skill3.description: Skill effects are increased by <color=#82C65D>2%</color> upon dealing or receiving DMG, stacking up to 15 times.

special_equip.name: Floating Radiance
special_equip.description: A kickboard with dreamy radiance under the sun. Rest on it to be immersed in the sound of the sea.

80.name: Nasha
80.title: Scarce Mage

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: A mage from the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North, hailed as the "Scarce Mage".$B$$B$She's able to cast long-lost forbidden magic.

She owes her strong magic power to the pact she made with the demons.$B$$B$The pact binds her to always protect the offspring of the demons—that is, the royal family of the Principality of Holmgard. Hence she's also titled "Defender of the Far North".
Being a tutor for the royal family, she has finer taste than most people. Her noble status is revealed in the way she dresses.

Her true passion lies in the study of magic. She spends most of her time in her yard, researching those long-lost magic spells.$B$$B$
Of her two students, Princess Lilia and La Crima, she seems to favor the latter. She has taught La Crima every Gem Magic spell she knows and often takes her to her tea parties.

skill1.name: Chronospace Shock
skill1.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Nasha's ATK to all enemies and inflicts 10s of Chronospace Rip on the targets.
Chronospace Rip: When dealing skill damage, Nasha ignores the target's Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> her ATK.

skill2.name: Dark Revelation
skill2.description: Hits all enemy targets with 4 magic attacks, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>240%</color> of Nasha's ATK. For the next 10s, Magic DMG taken by the enemy targets increases by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

skill3.name: Elite
skill3.description: Every use of a skill has a <color=#82C65D>100%</color> chance of restoring 1 Order Energy.

special_equip.name: Gorgeous Curtain
special_equip.description: Under the patronage of the Holmgard royal family, Nasha can study the lost magic as she pleases.

81.name: Kamui
81.title: Child of Noon

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: Born in an obscure village on Sunrise Island, Kamui could communicate with the god when she was little.$B$$B$As she got older, she has acquired psychic power strong enough to control everything around her with her mind.
But her power took a heavy toll on her body.$B$$B$Consequently, she lost control of it and wreaked havoc on her village, all the villagers dying in pain with their minds distorted.

Having lost her home, the girl suffered a mental breakdown that caused her to forget her past and gave her schizophrenia. And now she has two personalities living inside her—Tama and Kamui.$B$$B$Tama stays an innocent, harmless girl, while Kamui has inherited the ominous psychic power.$B$$B$Kamui can use her mind to manipulate people and even warp their psyches. But this dreaded power comes at the cost of a weary body and a nearly broken spirit.

The loss of memory did little to relieve her pain. Her vision was declining and her mind was growing fuzzy.$B$$B$She knew full well that one day she would lose control of her emotions and bring yet another disaster to this land.$B$$B$Instead of letting that happen, she thought she might as well make herself disappear, quietly. So she took her favorite books and left her village.$B$$B$No one has seen her ever since, and the only evidence of her existence is the painful memories she has left people with.

skill1.name: Reveal
skill1.description: Grants a Shield that absorbs damage equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of max Health to all allies; deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>60%</color> of max Health to the enemy target in the front row and reduces the target's Physical DEF by 3,000 (Can't stack up).

skill2.name: Seclusion
skill2.description: Reduces self Health by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> of max Health 5 times in a row (can be deemed as taking damage 5 times), each time healing other allies for <color=#82C65D>20%</color> of max Health ; increases all allies' ATK by 20%.

skill3.name: Divine Punishment
skill3.description: For every 5 instances of damage taken, Kamui applies Divine Punishment to all enemy targets, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of max Health. Can be triggered only once within 5s.

special_equip.name: Divine Dove
special_equip.description: A fantastic animal unaffected by Kamui's psychic power, who silently accompanied her during the years she lived alone

82.name: Sinmara
82.title: The Inferno

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Originally a respected scholar, she pledged fealty to the Chronospace Protector after learning about her ideals and became her most trusted underling.

She followed the Chronospace Protector into the War of Protectors but couldn't turn the defeat around. She watched helplessly as her beloved master was sealed away. Devastated, she decided to seek out the ultimate power to avenge her master.
To that end, she conducted all sorts of magic experiments, each more dangerous than the last. As she did so, hatred began to consume her and distort her mind.

After discovering Snegurochka's underground secret, Sinmara realized that her revenge plan was about to bear fruit. But first, she needs to take advantage of the situation to destroy Snegurochka root and branch...

skill1.name: Fiery Onslaught
skill1.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>370%</color> of self's ATK to a single enemy target, and increases self's ATK by 15% for 10 seconds

skill2.name: Lava Explosion
skill2.description: Every 1.5 seconds, deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets for unlimited time. Every additional use of Lava Explosion increases the damage of the skill by 15% for 15 seconds; stacks up to 5 times

skill3.name: Sworn Vengeance
skill3.description: Increases damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for every 10% Health lost.

special_equip.name: Abyssal Flame
special_equip.description: A chain that rises from the abyss of lava. Filled with Sinmara's grudges.

83.name: Cersivey
83.title: Saintess of Snegurochka

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: The Protector of Snegurochka and the Saintess revered by the Frost Chivalric Order. She lives in the Glacial Castle up the mountain. No resident near the mountain has ever seen her face.

Adept in ice magic, she appears to be as cold and apathetic as the endless blizzard around her. $B$$B$She keeps her distance from others and leaves all affairs concerning Snegurochka to her loyal chevaliers.

Snegurochka has been ruled by her for thousands of years. It is said that before it became this frozen world, Snegurochka was covered by lush greens and was warm all year round. It was a place where humans and animals lived in peace, but things are completely different now.

Outsiders take her for a ruthless tyrant, but her love for Snegurochka runs deep. She is willing to do anything to save this world. $B$$B$The blizzard around here seems to have something to do with her.

skill1.name: Frostbane
skill1.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Cersivey's ATK to a single target, and applies Frostbite to the target.
Frostbite: Reduces the target's Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Cersivey's ATK for 10s.

skill2.name: Cryofall
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of ATK to all enemies every 1.5s. Every additional Cryofall cast increases the damage of this skill by 15% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

skill3.name: Divine Judgment
skill3.description: Cersivey's enemy is marked and takes <color=#82C65D>50%</color> more damage.

special_equip.name: Sizzling Ice
special_equip.description: Made of special ice stone from the mysterious land of the far north. Except for Cersivey, others will be mercilessly frostbitten if they touch it.

84.name: Asherah
84.title: Protector of Irminsul

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: She won the ancient War of Protectors and restored peace to Irminsul. As the Protector of Irminsul, she has been guarding this land for centuries.
Thanks to her passion for the study of life, the entire Irminsul was overflowing with life and energy, and as a result, its people enjoyed a long life span.
When the Abnormality hit and her beloved Irminsul began to decline, Asherah returned to the magical research she once abandoned, trying to find a way to change the fate of Irminsul.
Her people haven't seen her in a long time. Even her Glorious Chevalier and Priest are not allowed to see her.

skill1.name: Meteor Flight
skill1.description: Strikes the enemy's back row 3 times, each time dealing physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>120%</color> of self's ATK.

skill2.name: Thorn Surge
skill2.description:
Asherah summons Thorn Surge to strike all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of self's ATK and inflicting them with Parasite for 15s.
Parasite: Reduces the target's Physical DEF equal to 7% of Asherah's ATK; stacks up to 6 times

skill3.name: Premonition
skill3.description: Crit DMG increases by <color=#82C65D>100%</color>. Every 2 successful skill attacks guarantee a Crit Hit.

special_equip.name: Sentience
special_equip.description: A symbol of the highest will of Irminsul, imbued with the power of life.

85.name: Flare
85.title: Priestess of Irminsul

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: Originally a sorcerer versed in various conjuring, she followed Protector Asherah into the War of Protectors. After victory, she was appointed by Asherah to manage the day-to-day affairs of Irminsul. She is deeply revered and loved by the people.
Before the Magical Abnormality, she took a girl from Fomoire Island as her apprentice and taught her everything she knew. The girl lived up to expectations and later became a powerful Ovate.

In the aftermath of the Magical Abnormality, the people of Irminsul turned into all kinds of magical creatures. Seeing this, she determined to grow her magic so that she would be strong enough to save them. However, her magic backfired and she became a monster herself.
She was devastated by this change along with the physical changes she was experiencing. Her faith collapsed, leaving her a distorted obsession to protect her people.

skill1.name: Healing Powder
skill1.description:
Restores Health equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Flare's ATK to all allies, and grants them Regen for 10s
Regen: Recovers Health equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Flare's ATK per second.

skill2.name: Undercurrent
skill2.description:
Flare returns to her priestess form, which increases her ATK and max Health both by 30%.
When using this skill in her priestess form, Flare deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of her ATK to all enemies and inflicts them with Dispirit for 5s.
Dispirit: Reduces the target's ATK by 30%.

skill3.name: Wisdom
skill3.description:
When in the back row of the formation, increases Physical DMG taken by all enemies by <color=#82C65D>16%</color> every 7s. Stacks up to 3 times.
When in the middle row, increases Magic DMG taken by all enemies by <color=#82C65D>16%</color> every 7s. Stacks up to 3 times. The effect disappears upon death.

special_equip.name: Glorious Amulet
special_equip.description: A testament to the past glory of Irminsul. Only allowed to be worn by the ritual-performing priestess.

86.name: Phrygia
86.title: Frog Chevalier

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Outwardly, he is a strange creature sporting chivalric attire. But he used to be an esteemed chevalier serving under Protector Asherah, sworn to guard Irminsul with his sword.

In a horrendous disaster where massive amounts of magic leaked out, his body mutated into the shape of a frog. He now feels great fatigue after a short period of activity for his apparent incongruity with this body.
After his mutation, he was always seen sitting by the road drowning his sorrow in wine.

He accidentally acquired the ability to travel across dimensions after his fight with Asherah. Then he used that ability to enter a world beyond his own and started searching for a way to lift the curse, hoping that one day Irminsul would return to normal.

skill1.name: Sword Gale
skill1.description: Increases Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for 10s, and hits the back-row enemy twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>60%</color> of ATK.

skill2.name: Drunken Motive
skill2.description:
Applies 10s of Drunken to self, then hits the back-row enemy 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>120%</color> of ATK.
Drunken: Increases ATK by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>20%</color>.

skill3.name: Indomitable
skill3.description: Phrygia's attacks and skills can't be dodged; and both ignore the target's Physical DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of self's ATK

special_equip.name: JS error while getting attributes
special_equip.description: JS error while getting attributes

88.name: Camilyne
88.title: Protector of Cassiel

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Without the magic items, she has been losing her magic power and has reverted to her petite and innocuous-looking child form.

She faithfully fulfills her role as a Protector. To that end, she even travels to the Lower Domain herself to eliminate the evolving monsters. She keeps warning the Witch, in whom she has taken a strong interest, not to get involved in the strife between the two domains.

To escape the monsters, she used all her magic power to lift Cassiel from the ground, turning it into floating isles. She rejected the Alliance of the Rebellions' request to lower the isles back on land. Instead, she keeps raising them up in order to protect them from monsters that have evolved wings.

Before taking her role as a Protector, she had been living in the Forest of Elves. When her predecessor, the former Protector, failed to stop Demongod Gordia from wreaking havoc on the world, Camilyne volunteered to take over the mantle, ready to give of herself to this land. She defeated Demongod with the help of Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars. Later on, when monsters overran Camilyne, she lifted Cassiel into the air. Her two successful attempts to save the world have deeply endeared herself to her people.

skill1.name: Holy Radiance
skill1.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Camilyne's ATK to a single enemy target in the front row and inflicts the target with 1 stack of Holy Scorch.
Holy Scorch: Increases the DMG taken from Camilyne by 10%, stacking up to 3 times.
When it stacks to 3 times, the next Strike of Faith deals 3 times DMG to the target and removes all Holy Scorch effects.

skill2.name: Strike of Faith
skill2.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of Camilyne's ATK to all enemies.
When the Holy Scorch effect of the target stacks up to 3 times, Strike of Faith deals 3 times DMG and removes all stacks of Holy Scorch.

skill3.name: Protector's Will
skill3.description: Generates a shield every <color=#82C65D>4</color> seconds, reducing the next damage Camilyne takes by 80% and dealing an additional Physical DMG equal to 200% of self's ATK to the enemy attacking Camilyne.

special_equip.name: Peacebringer
special_equip.description: The symbol of Protector. Represents Camilyne's dedication to protecting Cassiel.

89.name: Dark Anemone
89.title: Executor of Darkness

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: After being taken in by the Holy Church, Anemone was still as lonely as ever. Everyone feared her powers.$B$$B$Ostracized, the poor girl was often seen curled up in the corner.

The priest Fellagood soon noticed her and her special abilities and felt like he hit the jackpot.$B$$B$With a hidden agenda in mind, he convinced the Holy Church leadership to let him take Anemone with him to clean out heretics.$B$$B$He never taught her anything about the world, and only used her as a pawn to do his dirty work.

The kind-hearted Anemone was obviously not cut out for that kind of work. Every time she returned from a failed mission, she was met with brutal punishment. Fellagood even used a forbidden drug on her in an attempt to bring out her elemental powers.$B$$B$All this torment and suffering filled her with hatred of this world—of the indifference and despair pervading it.$B$$B$Finally, a mental breakdown, coupled with the onset of her elemental powers, transformed Anemone into a mindless puppet at the beck and call of the Holy Church.

Anemone, now with her soul broken, was regarded by Fellagood as his proudest work. She blindly followed his orders and slaughtered her targets without batting an eye. The church leadership had little control over her.$B$$B$Fellagood, who had long held resentment against the church, finally located the Sacred Relic. His plan, which had been years in the making, was close to being fulfilled. He upped the dosage of the forbidden drug to kill what little humanity remained in Anemone and turn her into his slave.$B$$B$When all was set, he took her into the forbidden Chrono Tower.

skill1.name: Bind of Desire
skill1.description:
Hits the enemy's back row 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>105%</color> of ATK. Every hit scored adds 1 stack of Dark Bind, lasting 15s.
Dark Bind: When stacked to 6 times, hits the target once, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>180%</color> of ATK. For the next 10s, Anemone's skills deal 30% more damage to the same target.

skill2.name: Avenge
skill2.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>180%</color> of ATK to all enemy targets. For the next 10s, increases Crit Chance by 10%, and inflicts Execution on enemy targets.
Execution: For the next 10s, when the target takes damage, it will take additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Anemone's ATK. This effect cannot stack.

skill3.name: Brutality
skill3.description: After combat begins, increases Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> every 10s, up to<color=#82C65D>50%</color>.

special_equip.name: Malevolence
special_equip.description: A fatal weapon utterly exuding malevolence when coming to heretics.

90.name: Betsy
90.title: Night Crawler

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: A festive mood filled the air as Halloween approached.$B$$B$However, the magistrate had been receiving reports of food going missing at night—food people carefully prepared for the upcoming holiday. Some eyewitnesses described a fluffy black thing flashing by. Some said it was an agile girl.$B$$B$As similar complaints kept coming in, the magistrate decided to take action: he put some delicious food on a stall and then hid in the dark to watch.$B$$B$Sure enough, when night fell, that mysterious black figure showed up.

"There you are, you damn thief!"$B$$B$The magistrate sneaked up on the target, chest filled with anger, only to find, to his utter surprise, that it was a cute cheerful girl, one with a pair of eye-catching ears.$B$$B$Her feasting was interrupted by the magistrate. She explained that she had no ill intent and that she was only attracted there by the smell of food. After a brief talk with the girl, the magistrate realized she was just an innocent girl clueless about how human society works.$B$$B$So instead of punishing her, he invited her to his home. In no time at all, the cat spirit Betsy became friends with the magistrate's daughter.

Betsy used to live in the woods away from human society like the rest of her kind. When she was little, she heard her parents mention a species called human.$B$$B$"Those short-eared creatures never listen to reason. And they're very rude, too. They want to catch us and make us their pets. How ridiculous is that? We're the noble cat spirits, for Christ's sake. We have nothing in common with those docile kittens they keep in their homes."$B$$B$Her parents' rant only made Betsy curious about humans, planting in her the idea of seeing the human world for herself.

Finally, Betsy's curiosity reached a fever pitch, and in the face of her parents' opposition, she left the woods and ran into the human world—the place she had been longing for.$B$$B$The busy streets, the bustling people—everything looked so refreshing and interesting to the uninitiated eyes of the innocent cat spirit. Excited, she had forgotten her parents' words of caution and was ready to plunge herself into an unknown world.

skill1.name: Trick or Treat
skill1.description: Whips a single target to steal the candy in their pocket, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK. Increases DMG Dealt by 12% for 10s.

skill2.name: Pumpkin Party
skill2.description: Summons a pumpkin bomb at the front to deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of ATK to all enemy targets. Increases DMG dealt by 12% for 10s, stacking up to 2 times.

skill3.name: Wreak Havoc
skill3.description: Betsy deals <color=#82C65D>40%</color> more damage during the first 60s of combat.

special_equip.name: Dark Stalking
special_equip.description: The long whip that Betsy carries around, always raiding enemies from unexpected directions.

91.name: Curtana
91.title: Justice Bringer

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory:
The Adjudicator of the Sanctuary. A top decision-maker of the organization, though one that skips all kinds of important meetings.
She is of such a high status that other leaders of the Sanctuary address her by honorifics. Some speculate she is the actual ruler of the Sanctuary.
Always carries with her the Swords of Divine Judgment, Parondit & Fusariel. Legend has it that back in Primeval Times, she used the dual swords to slash the sky, thus forming the Heavenly River.

Back in Primeval Times, Demongod Gordia plunged the world into chaos. In the fight to stop her, Curtana suffered heavy injuries and lost much of her power.
She had to watch helplessly as the world suffered. At the moment of her deepest despair, God spoke to her and instructed her to give the sacred object, Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, to a human child. The move eventually saved the world.

Having lost much of her power, a crippling sense of inadequacy compelled Curtana to resign as the Protector. But still, she never forgot her oath to defend Cassiel.
Even though she had retired from political affairs for a long time, when demons invaded, she once again drew the Swords of Divine Judgment and joined the fight to protect Cassiel.

skill1.name: Shadow Slash
skill1.description: Attacks all enemies twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>250%</color> of self's ATK

skill2.name: Field of Swords
skill2.description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of self's ATK, while inflicting them with 1 stack of Soul Crush. Then, after a short delay, burst the sword energy, dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets.
Soul Crush: Decreases the inflicted target's Physical DEF by 10% for 10 seconds; stacks up to 3 times.

skill3.name: Sword Mastery
skill3.description: When landing on a target, a normal attack has a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance of unleashing the skill Shadow Slash

special_equip.name: Divine Judgment
special_equip.description: The Swords of Divine Judgment, also known as Parondit & Fusariel, hold magic powerful enough to cut the sky in half.

92.name: Little Akasha
92.title: Budding Sword Maiden

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Born into nobility. Belongs to a clan of mage-swordswomen famed across the Sanctuary. Been practicing the sword under her father's supervision since she was little.
It's natural for a child her age to be drawn more to flowers in the fields and small animals than to tedious sword training.

Her sword skills keep getting better every day thanks to the training. Yet she doesn't understand why she needs to swing a sword at all. Still, she doesn't complain and tries to live every day to the fullest.

The appearance of Demongod Gordia shattered the peace of the world. The girl's entire clan joined the crusade against Gordia. She watched in tears as everyone around her fell, helpless and devastated. Until one day the Protector of the Sanctuary came before her, bringing her the last ray of hope: Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars.

skill1.name: Sword Wielder
skill1.description:
Gains a brief immunity to all damage and debuffs, then swings the sword to deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of self's ATK to the enemy's front row, acquiring 1 stack of Focus in the process.
Focus: Increases Gloryfell's damage by 25%; stacks up to 4 times.

skill2.name: Gloryfell
skill2.description: Gains a 1-second immunity to all damage and debuffs, then ignores the target's DEF and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>250%</color> of self's ATK to the enemy's front row, consuming all the effect of Focus in the process.

skill3.name: Tender Sword
skill3.description: During combat, every two uses of skill increase next skill damage by <color=#82C65D>75%</color>

special_equip.name: Ceremonial Sword
special_equip.description: A ceremonial sword used in rituals. It's more about looking cool than dealing damage.

93.name: Gracin
93.title: Calamity Doctor

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: A doctor who travels around the world. Shunned by people because of her strange attire.

Gracin is often seen gathering exotic herbs in the forest and brewing them into potions. Because of the unpleasant smell of her potions, her patients often have to pinch their noses while drinking them.

Though her medical techniques are frowned upon by those esteemed doctors in Lunia, Gracin has been doing a great job of healing up underprivileged patients, earning her a reputation among the downtrodden.

Lunia, fresh out of a war, is now in shambles. Its people are displaced and suffering from a spreading plague. Gracin, a traveling doctor, is summoned for an audience with Princess Eulalia. Moved by the princess' kindness, Gracin decides to stay at her side to dole out healing where it's needed.

skill1.name: Consolation
skill1.description: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>460%</color> of Gracin's ATK

skill2.name: Calamity Eliminator
skill2.description: Cleanses all allies of debuffs. For the next 10s, every time an ally deals DMG, Crit Chance increases by <color=#82C65D>4%</color>, up to <color=#82C65D>40%</color>

skill3.name: Calamitous Feedback
skill3.description: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of Gracin's ATK every 5 seconds.

special_equip.name: Soul Calmer
special_equip.description: A staff capable of healing wounds and eliminating disasters.

94.name: Goddess Dana
94.title: Will of Kaamos

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: She's the goddess worshiped by all creatures of Elf Lakeside, and the leader of the High Elves. She led her followers in Elf Lakeside to defend against the invasion of the ancient Demongod Gordia and eventually, with the help of Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, eliminated the Demongod and saved the world.

In the tales passed through generations in Elf Lakeside, Dana is always portrayed as a high-and-mighty, human-hating elf. Before joining force with a human to destroy Demongod, Dana had a distaste for the human race and cared only about preserving the lineage of elves in which she took pride.

After Demongod was destroyed and peace returned, a young man blundered his way into the Forest of Elves. He seemed to have just escaped from the Sanctuary and was on the run from a group of sorcerers. Mortally wounded, he fell beside Dana, who was taking a walk by the lake. Then the sorcerers came. Annoyed by their intrusion, Dana had them punished.
She studied the young man lying on the ground. The sight of his handsome face brought warmth to her cold heart. She had her maids help him up and take him back to the Forest of Elves.

Out of respect for Dana, denizens of the Forest of Elves refrained from booting out the young man. The young man recovers gradually under the care of the maid. His presence offered a refreshing change from the other groveling High Elves—he would tell Dana about things going on in the outside world; sometimes he would even entertain her with funny jokes.
Moreover, the young man often wrote poetry and songs. His talent was met with great admiration from Dana, who, like the rest of the High Elves, had a taste for music. Even the maids looking after him took a liking to him. Just like that, the cold heart of the long-lived elven goddess began to melt, all because of a wonderful encounter...

skill1.name: Starfall
skill1.description:
Performs 5 magic attacks on a single enemy, each attack dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>80%</color> of ATK and inflicting the target with Frail for 10s.
Frail: Magic DEF and Magic DMG dealt both decrease by 3% of Goddess Dana's ATK; stacks up to 30%.

skill2.name: Magic Burst
skill2.description: Hits all enemies with 3 attacks, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> ATK, plus an extra attack that deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Evernight
skill3.description: Deals <color=#82C65D>50%</color> more DMG in the Energy Outbreak status

special_equip.name: Everwatcher
special_equip.description: An artifact that once kept Demongod at bay. Now safeguards the future of the Elves.

95.name: Idol Flora
95.title: Dream Stage

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: A mysterious girl from the Forest of Elves. This was her first time away from home, so she kept a cautious distance from strangers. But she was curious all the same and carefully observed everything going on around her.

For generations, the Forest of Elves had been the peaceful abode of the High Elves, but then the rise of the Floating Isles of Cassiel shattered the peace. $B$$B$Excessive exposure to sunlight caused the trees to stop growing, and withering crept in from the forest's edge. Worse, monsters began flying up from the ground to invade the forest. $B$$B$The downfall of the Forest of Elves seemed inevitable...

Seeing all this, Flora realized that the Elves alone would never bring salvation. $B$$B$They required the help of that which they most despised—Humans. They needed manpower to provide magic, as well as the money to build sunlight-abating facilities. Only then could tranquility be restored to the Forest of Elves.

For Flora, that was too long a shot. But still, she set aside her misgivings and joined the team—she would get on the Dazzling Stage and become an idol. $B$$B$She trained hard every day toward that end. But things didn't go as smoothly as she had hoped. Difficulties abounded. A gloomy future awaited Forest of Elves...

skill1.name: Limelight
skill1.description:
Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK to all enemies 4 times, and applies Intoxicated to all the targets.
Intoxicated: The target takes 30% more damage from Flora for 10s while intoxicated in Flora's performance.

skill2.name: Dazzling Stage
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>120%</color> of ATK to a single target 4 times. After deducting the Chaos Energy this skill consumed, every 1 Chaos Energy left increases the damage dealt by 20%.

skill3.name: Rainbow Trail
skill3.description: After every <color=#82C65D>1</color> Dazzling Stage skill(s) cast, the next Dazzling Stage consumes 3 less Chaos Energy.

special_equip.name: Melody Echo
special_equip.description: Originally, it was just an ordinary microphone. Under the nourishment of Flora's beautiful singing voice, it began to gradually change......

97.name: Phileanosis
97.title: Lost Wail

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: A traveling scholar who recently appeared out of nowhere in the Chrono Tower. Seems to possess mysterious magic that allows her to manipulate time.

Phileanosis used to be a loyal follower of the Chronospace Protector until the latter was sealed. That's when she lost her faith and started traveling the world. She witnessed the passage of time and the unfolding of history.
When Phileanosis learned of the reemergence of the Chrono Tower, it rekindled her long-dead hope of seeing the Chronospace Protector again. Harboring that hope, he entered the tower.

Originally a human scholar, her academic curiosity brought her into contact with the Chronospace Protector. Over time, she became the latter's disciple. Deeply trusted by the Chronospace Protector, she learned time magic, which allowed her to stop her own time and always remain as young as she was when she first met the Chronospace Protector.

skill1.name: Aether Flow
skill1.description:
Reduces DMG taken by all allies by <color=#82C65D>20%</color> for 5s. After that, restores their Health equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of the DMG taken.
Can only be cast once every 5 seconds.

skill2.name: Time Overclock
skill2.description: The next time any ally uses an active skill, its DMG and healing effect increase by <color=#82C65D>100%</color>, and all enemies take extra Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Time Prognosis
skill3.description: When using Aether Flow, there's a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance to get 1 Chaos Energy; when using Time Overclock, there's a <color=#82C65D>50%</color> chance to get 1 Order Energy.

special_equip.name: Time Reset
special_equip.description: Time is reset again and again, but the future stays the same.

98.name: Maja Kany
98.title: E-dimensional Merchant

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: A merchant who travels around with all kinds of exotic goods. No one knows where she got them from.

According to herself, she came from a poor family and at a young age joined an eccentric master merchant in his travels. When the merchant went missing, she inherited his fortune and started her own business.
For a money-grubbing merchant, she has a surprisingly good reputation. Even many nobles come to buy curiosities from her.

Years of hustling and struggling out in the world have molded her into a sophisticated merchant—one with her own way of doing business. Often plainly dressed, she has easily endeared herself to the townsfolk. The goods in her backpack are always quickly snapped up.

skill1.name: Magic Sparkle
skill1.description:
Launches 5 magic attacks on a random target, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>60%</color> of ATK and inflicting 10 seconds of Dazzled.
Dazzled: Increases Magic DMG taken by 6% and reduces ATK by an amount equal to 8% of Maja Kany's ATK; stacks up to 5 times.

skill2.name: Leaping Scroll
skill2.description:
Gives all allies a 15-second shield equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of Maja Kany's ATK and regenerates the same amount of Health. When the shield is active, Magic DMG taken decreases by 15%, and a stack of Leap is applied every 3 seconds.
Leap: Increases Magic DMG dealt by 5%; stacks up to 10 times.

skill3.name: High Spirited
skill3.description: Recovers 1 Chaos Energy upon taking damage. The effect can only be triggered once in <color=#82C65D>2</color> seconds.

special_equip.name: Plop Bag
special_equip.description: Whatever you want, you'll find it here—and at unbeatable prices too. Don't miss out!

99.name: Eddine
99.title: Mana Dream

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory:
A dweller in the dreamland, she has a mysterious aura and a pair of wings that flutter gently.
Every time Eddine shows up, she has a swarm of glowing butterflies dancing around her, and together they fly into the dreamland.

If there is one word to sum up Eddine, it is "dreamlike". And yet she is also so real.
Those who enter the dreamland feel like they also turn into butterflies. With Eddine whispering in their ears, and swarms of other butterflies guiding them, they fly deeper and deeper into the dreamland.

Different events happen in every encounter with Eddine. That's probably because one's state of mind always changes, and when entering the dreamland, the scenes change as well.
Seeing the flickering glow of the butterflies in the dreamland, one could easily forget the passage of time and even fall into slumber.
Feeble as it may be, the movement of a butterfly's wings can cause small disturbances in the air, thus spreading the magic power around.
One that has felt this subtle process would regard it as a proof that everything here is real.

All existence is subject to the cycle of birth and death. Eddine is no exception.
Being a creation, one day Eddine will fulfill her purpose, then she will forever stay in the dreamland with the butterflies, or just perish along with the dreamland itself.
But until that day comes, she will still be here and continue to guide people into the dreamland where they will forever lose themselves in the sensation of delusions and intoxication.

skill1.name: Surreal
skill1.description:
Applies 10s of Dreaming to self; hits all enemies, dealing Magic DMG equal to 
<color=#82C65D>400%</color> of self's ATK; increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> for 10s.
Dreaming: Increases Order Energy regeneration rate by <color=#82C65D>80%</color>.

skill2.name: Into A Dream
skill2.description:
Applies 10s of Slumber to all enemies.
Slumber: Stuns targets for 3s and reduces their Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Eddine's ATK.

skill3.name: Enraptured
skill3.description: On each skill use, increases all allies' Magic DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>15%</color> for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

special_equip.name: Reverie
special_equip.description: A magical item with a soft luminous glow. Can guide people into the dreamland.

100.name: Amorai
100.title: Emotional Therapist

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: Amorai runs her own clinic in a small town in the Principality of Lunia.$B$$B$According to the townsfolk, every drug she prescribes is made by herself. All sorts of bizarre medical conditions could be cured by her.

Whenever someone tries to engage her in a friendly chat, she swerves off to an irrelevant subject and ends the conversation prematurely.$B$$B$Over time, people talk to her less and less. $B$$B$As a result, even though her medical skills are widely praised across town, her personal life remains little known.

Despite her eccentricities, Amorai is lauded as one of the most talented researchers in Lunia.$B$$B$Her academic accomplishments even made a splash among old scholars. $B$$B$But instead of being distracted by the accolades, Amorai buries herself in the study of medicine and arcane occultism.

There is a rumor in town that Amorai once raised a homeless girl as her own daughter and addressed her lovingly as "Honey."$B$$B$Her assistant disclosed that during that time Amorai pissed her off less often than she usually did. $B$$B$Although the girl verbally protested being called "Honey", she did what Amorai told her and went to school in town.

skill1.name: Diagnosis
skill1.description:
Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Amorai's ATK and applies the Psyched to them for 15s.
Psyched: Attacks ignore the enemy's Physical DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>20%</color> of self's ATK

skill2.name: Medical Precaution
skill2.description: Grants all allies a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Amorai's ATK for 15s and increases their ATK, DEF and Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>, <color=#82C65D>30%</color>, and <color=#82C65D>30%</color> respectively for 10s.

skill3.name: Deep Breath
skill3.description: Recovers <color=#82C65D>2</color> Chaos Energy when using the skill Diagnosis.

special_equip.name: Ode to Sorrow
special_equip.description: Amorai has a way of cheering people up with her words. If you're in a bad mood, come talk to her.

101.name: Bellavita
101.title: Sea Elf

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: Bellavita, a sea-dwelling elf, has spent eons in the company of fish and the tides and rarely crosses paths with humans.

Most of the time, Bellavita hunkers down at the bottom of the sea, surrounded by fish. Only when the sun sinks below the horizon does she quietly leap out of the sea to enjoy her evening in solitude on the beach.

One night, as usual, Bellavita emerged from the sea and came to the beach. That was when she saw a baby lying quietly on the ground in swaddling clothes. Instead of crying at the sight of her, it beamed. A strange emotion rose in Bellavita's chest.

She named the baby girl "Ardisia", then took her into the sea and taught her how to breathe underwater. She grew up healthy under Bellavita's care. But Bellavita can be a little overprotective: Whenever a boy tries to approach Ardisia, she immediately conjures a tidal wave to warn him off.

skill1.name: Boundless Sea
skill1.description: Restores Health equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> Bellavita's ATK to all allies, increases their max Health by 10% and reduces DMG they take by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Bellavita's ATK for 10s

skill2.name: Spiritual Water
skill2.description: Cleanses all allies of all their debuffs, heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of Bellavita's ATK, and increases their Magic DMG by <color=#82C65D>40%</color> for 10s

skill3.name: Raging Current
skill3.description: When a Doll's Health is below 50%, automatically casts Boundless Sea once. Can be triggered only once every <color=#82C65D>10</color>s

special_equip.name: Seaflow
special_equip.description: A ribbon carrying the will of the sea. It can not only see the billowing waves, but also hear the tides.

102.name: Princess Amanami
102.title: Floral Echo

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: A princess deeply beloved by the people. Despite her innocent looks—which contrasts with the queen's stern demeanor—she is actually quite into political affairs. Recently, she often walked out of the palace and visited the villages and towns, to show her care for the suffering of the people.
As the queen's heir, she receives an elite education and is busy with official work every day. Yet she never complains and does her job exceptionally well. This has earned her widespread respect.

Word has it that Amanami's dances originate from the god's blessings, and that as the successor to the Living God, she commits herself to delivering His blessings to her people.
Every day after she wraps up her work, she hauls her exhausted body to the yard to practice dance for the coming Kami Festival.
The setting sun casts a red glow over her slim figure as she twirls and dances and sings. It's a beautiful sight, so beautiful it moves the on-looking maids to tears.

Early in the morning when the dew still clings to the verdant leaves, Amanami sets off with her maids on an outing. As her long hair brushes past the flowers, she raises her hand to dab away her tears and begins to dance to the singing of the maids in the midst of the flower rain. Quite like a goddess sent from above.

skill1.name: Autumn Ode
skill1.description:
Grants every ally a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of Princess Amanami's ATK that lasts 8 seconds.
When the Shield wears off, restores HP equal to <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of Princess Amanami's ATK for every ally unit.
If the Shield breaks before it wears off, inflicts the attacker with Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>160%</color> of Princess Amanami's ATK

skill2.name: Harmony's Scent
skill2.description:
Restores HP equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of Princess Amanami's ATK to all allies and grants them a stack of Stride that lasts 15 seconds.
Stride: Every stack increases the targets' ATK by 15% and allows them to ignore the enemy's Magic DEF equal to 15% of Princess Amanami's ATK when dealing damage. Stacks up to 3 times.

skill3.name: Whisper of Flower
skill3.description: Every use of Harmony's Scent grants <color=#82C65D>2</color> Chaos Energy

special_equip.name: Kalavin
special_equip.description: A ceremonial instrument used during rituals to worship the god. Adorned with the feathers of the divine birds from Elysium

103.name: Ninsar
103.title: Verdure Whisper

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: An elven girl who grew up in the forest. Never been to the outside world. Goes to the clearing in the woods every day to feed pigeons.
The pigeons, which normally fear humans, are surprisingly affectionate toward Ninsar—she's often seen rubbing their feathers with her cheek.

Unlike most high elves, Ninsar doesn't loathe humans. She dreams of freely exploring the outside world like the pigeons.
She is one of the fans of Flora, and her biggest wish is to share the stage with Flora one day.

After learning that Flora learned her tunes from Mayahuel, she pesters Mayahuel every day to teach her music and always ends up being scolded. But she doesn't mind. She even gets the idea of sneaking out of the forest to learn music in the human world.

skill1.name: Peace Melody
skill1.description:
Gives all allies a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of self's ATK that lasts 15 seconds. Also, grants them 15 seconds of Forest Blessing.
Forest Blessing: Increases ATK and DEF both by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times.

skill2.name: Forest Aegis
skill2.description:
Summons vines to deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>450%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets and immobilizes them for 1 second. Meanwhile, inflicts them with 5 seconds of Impaired.
Impaired: Decreases the target's ATK by an amount equal to 80% of Ninsar's ATK. Cannot stack.

skill3.name: Forest Ballad
skill3.description: Every stack of Forest Blessing on Ninsar speeds up Order Energy recovery by <color=#82C65D>10%</color>

special_equip.name: Regeneration
special_equip.description: An unpretentious brooch, but in fact blessed with the power of blessing by the Goddess of the Lake

104.name: U·Pollyben
104.title: Endless Mirage

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: Elsewhere, U·Pollyben would have been recognized for her great talent in painting. But in the Kingdom of Celtica, that talent has largely gone unnoticed.

War with the neighboring kingdoms has all but obliterated the cities of Celtica. U·Pollyben has forgotten how she managed to flee from her home to this strange city. To escape the pain of the past, she cuts herself off from the outside world and spends all her waking hours painting so that she has no time to think.

It was a tragedy that no words can describe—at least for U·Pollyben, that's the case. It left her with nothing but a sketchbook and a paintbrush. She withdrew into her own shell and started using her paintbrush to build her own world of fantasy.

Every time she thought of that tragedy, of how her hometown was destroyed by war, she felt a strong pang of pain that drove her to paint frantically on that blank canvas. In the end, however, she couldn't finish the painting. She just sat quietly in the corner with a blank mind, waiting for her salvation.

skill1.name: Spiritual Flash
skill1.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>400%</color> of self's ATK to the enemy's back row. Ignores the target's Magic DEF equal to 10% of self's ATK for 10s; stacks up to 3 times.

skill2.name: Smoke and Mirrors
skill2.description: Strikes all enemies 4 times, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Cloak of Illusion
skill3.description: Within 5s after casting Smoke and Mirrors, reduces all DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>, and there is a <color=#82C65D>30%</color> chance of casting Smoke and Mirrors without consuming Chaos Energy.

special_equip.name: Virtual Vision
special_equip.description: U·Pollyben uses her paintbrush to create beautiful worlds, worlds that only she can see.

105.name: Claire
105.title: Shiny Girl

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: A girl from the Sanctuary who contrasts the traditional image of a serious and rustic Sanctuary dweller. Often seen going shopping in the market.
Gained worldwide fame for winning the last season of Shiny Girls, thus becoming a top idol that many girls see as a role model.

She prefers to be called a genius sorcerer than an idol, and she aspires to be the most glamorous and strongest sorcerer ever. When she casts spells, her golden hair flutters in the wind as lightning and thunder rage around her. It's a breathtaking sight from a distance.

She doesn't consider herself a good idol and prefers that the Protector recognize her as a sorcerer. In private, she undergoes rigorous magic training and assists the Protector in destroying monsters coming up from the ground.
Her pretty blonde hair is wet from rain, her clothes are covered in mud, and the blood on her fair skin has yet to dry—but none of it stops her from relishing the battle.
"There are no better decorations than rain and mud. I can feel the glow of my magic. It's so hot... My fighting spirit burns like fire. This is my stage, this is where I shine."

skill1.name: Thunderstrike
skill1.description: Claire attacks a random target 5 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. Meanwhile, Claire's ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>27%</color> for 15s.

skill2.name: Bright Starlight
skill2.description:
Attack all enemies 10 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>90%</color> of ATK. 
For each release of Bright Starlight, the DMG dealt by all skills released thereafter is increased by 2%; stacks up to 50 times.

skill3.name: Dazzling Stage
skill3.description: DMG Dealt increases by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

special_equip.name: Shiny Star
special_equip.description: When Claire picks it up, the winner of the idol contest is a forgone conclusion.

106.name: Sally
106.title: Health Wisher

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: In a small town in the Principality of Lunia, there is a clinic, unusual but well-reputed. Sally is proud to work there as a nurse.$B$$B$She still remembers the day she recommended herself for the role. Doctor Amorai asked a lot of strange questions, but she took them in stride and answered with ease. $B$$B$"Just like that, I muddled through the test and got hired. It felt like a dream." Sally recalled.

In her early days on the job, Sally found herself insanely busy catering to Doctor Amorai's whims.$B$$B$For example, raise a cat and observe how it reacts to onions; collect nightingale tears and toad slime, and turn them into solids; adopt a human cub and treat her as a daughter...$B$$B$"Wait, 'human cub' is how Doctor Amorai calls it! It's a human girl, actually. And she's old enough for school now." Sally quickly corrected herself.

Sally has a love-hate relationship with her work.$B$$B$At first she thought she would work as a nurse in the clinic, but slowly she realized she was more like Doctor Amorai's assistant. The clinic stopped hiring since she joined, so she handles more work than a typical nurse.$B$$B$"To be more exact, it's just me and Doctor Amorai. The two of us can handle the day-to-day running of the clinic, yes, but..." Sally paused in mid-sentence.

Often after a long day at work, Sally goes to a roadside tavern to unwind.$B$$B$Her favorite drink is honey beer—low in alcohol and sweet on the palate.$B$$B$One time, Doctor Amorai forgot Sally's reminder again and let precious medicinal materials go to waste. Sally flew into a rage and didn't calm down until Doctor Amorai promised her a raise. $B$$B$"I hate to admit it, but she's really generous with me... Ahem, and... the honey beer's really good!" Sally said with a smile, and there was no more embarrassment on her face.$B$$B$Since Doctor Amorai is pretty tight-lipped about herself, I had to talk to her assistant.$B$——From a resident of the town.

skill1.name: Clear Sight
skill1.description: Increases self's Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> for 15s and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK to the back-row enemy.

skill2.name: Injection Time
skill2.description: Ignores <color=#82C65D>20%</color> of the target's Physical DEF and hits the back-row enemy 4 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>180%</color> of ATK.

skill3.name: Practice Makes Perfect
skill3.description: When using a skill, self's Crit DMG increases by <color=#82C65D>5%</color>; stacks up to <color=#82C65D>5</color> times

special_equip.name: Healer's Kit
special_equip.description: A medical kit filled with all kinds of healing potions and medical devices. Sally carries it wherever she goes.

107.name: Naiad
107.title: Soul Blade

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: The personal guard of Princess Amanami, conscientious and straightforward. A little foolhardy, but able to handle crises with a cool head.
Been staying at the Princess's side, dedicated to her job. Capable of enchanting her blade with souls and using it to cut down anyone who threatens to harm the Princess.
Grew up with Amanami. Determined to give the Princess everything she has. Never lets up in her martial training.

Like Amanami, she never set foot outside her hometown, but neither does she have any curiosity about what lies beyond—she believes the outside world will bring nothing but danger to the island. She has nothing in common with other girls her age, so she is always misunderstood and seen as a freak.

skill1.name: Blade Draw
skill1.description: Naiad cuts down a single target, inflicting Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK for 3 times. For the next 10s, Naiad's Crit Chance increases by 30%.

skill2.name: Soul Break
skill2.description: Naiad draws her blade and makes a frontal slash, then performs an iaido attack that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>950%</color> of ATK to all enemies.

skill3.name: Mind Blade
skill3.description: After entering combat, Crit DMG increases by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> every 5s, up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>50%</color>; self's ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>6%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

special_equip.name: Soulgain·Flame Chopper
special_equip.description: This blade is a gift from Amanami. As its name suggests, it can extinguish flame and clear paths. It can destroy souls and vanquish evil spirits before guiding them to the underworld.

108.name: Tuonel of Night
108.title: Princess of Memory

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: Coming from the Sanctuary, she seems to have a hard time blending in human society and now lives as an outcast in a Lower Domain village.$B$$B$She is skilled at common healing spells and works as an apothecary in her village.

Tuonel rarely leaves home and only talks to the villagers she knows well. $B$$B$Her outstanding medical skills have endeared her to her fellow villagers, who often give her their crops as gifts. $B$$B$This is the kind of life Tuonel always wants—simple and peaceful.

With the Spring Festival on its way, the kind villagers have spruced up their village. $B$$B$Though not much of a talker, Tuonel longs to be part of the coming festive occasion and is trying to fit in with the humans.

The recent monster invasions of the Lower Domain leave many worried. $B$$B$To protect her village, Tuonel dusted off the Guardian Devil her mother left her. $B$$B$BBut having been kept away in the dark for too long, the Guardian Devil ran amok as soon as it awoke from its slumber, giving Tuonel quite a headache.

skill1.name: Devil's Protection
skill1.description: Grants all allies a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Tuonel's max HP that lasts up to 15s. An allied Doll protected by the Shield gains ATK equal to <color=#82C65D>5%</color> of Tuonel's max HP. When the Shield breaks, that Doll recovers Health equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Tuonel's max HP.

skill2.name: Dark Taboo
skill2.description:
Hits all enemy targets with Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Tuonel's max HP while inflicting them with Stun for 1s and Awe for 10s.
Awe: Reduces Magic DEF by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> and DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>.

skill3.name: Fearless
skill3.description: For allied Dolls, every 10% HP lost reduces DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#82C65D>60%</color>.

special_equip.name: Patton Bear
special_equip.description: The toy bear hosts a powerful demon that can destroy the world. This demon only takes orders from Tuonel.

109.name: Sanva
109.title: Spirit of Lethe

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: The deliverer guarding the entrance of the Underworld. Unlike the rest of her kind, Sanva is not responsible for guiding human souls to their afterlife.
Sanva takes direct orders from the ruler of the Underworld and is charged with keeping peace in the Underworld. She shows no leniency to those restless evil spirits.
Her umbrella is said to have lain at the bottom of the Lethe for thousands of years, during which it has absorbed the grudges of countless souls.

Although technically she is a subordinate of Kyphon, in reality she doesn't take orders from her—her loyalty lies only with Acheronte. She resents Kyphon's laziness and has once made her resentment known to Acheronte.

skill1.name: Night Spring
skill1.description: For the next 6 seconds, transfers all DMG taken by allies to self. During this time, self takes 60% less DMG and generates a shield equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of self's max Health.

skill2.name: Second Wind
skill2.description: Attack all enemies 6 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>100%</color> of ATK. Meanwhile, restores Health equal to <color=#82C65D>20%</color> of self's max Health and cleanses all debuffs.

skill3.name: Echo Beyond
skill3.description: After casting Night Spring, all allies' attacks ignore enemy DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>6%</color> of Sanva's ATK, and increases Sanva's max Health by <color=#82C65D>10%</color>; stacks up to 3 times.

special_equip.name: Forsakenness
special_equip.description: Absorbed the energy of the Lethe, with the power to make evil spirits forsake their past and fall into an eternal slumber at the bottom of the Lethe.

110.name: Kapla
110.title: Spring Beast

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Kapla came from Principality of Muntenia where she used to live with her fellow tribesmen.$B$$B$She is full of curiosity about the world. Upon learning that humans were about to celebrate the Spring Festival, their most important occasion, she left the forest to visit the human town in its festive glory.

Everything in town looked so novel and outlandish to Kapla. The dazzling display of Spring Festival goodies, especially those culinary delicacies, made her mouth water. $B$$B$When the naive Kapla was done feasting at a barbecue stall and the vendor asked her to pay, she was totally confused.

More vendors came to demand payment from Kapla and had her surrounded. Kapla was unfazed and let out a beastly roar in anger. Before she could bite anyone, the poor vendors had run away screaming in horror.

Kapla may behave strangely because she is differently wired, but at heart she is a good kid. $B$$B$After staying in town for a while, she grew attached to humans and started playing around with them—she even took to pulling pranks on people. $B$$B$And just like that, this naughty girl miraculously blended in with the festive town.

skill1.name: Itch for Action
skill1.description:
Applies 10s of Battle Ready to self, then hits the front-row enemy twice with Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>360%</color> of ATK.
Battle Ready: Restores Health equal to 12% of ATK per second, increases damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>, and reduces damage taken by <color=#82C65D>30%</color>

skill2.name: Undaunted
skill2.description: Grants self a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of ATK that lasts up to 15s, deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK to the front-row enemy, and reduces all enemy targets' Physical DEF by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Kapla's ATK within 10s.

skill3.name: Tit for Tat
skill3.description: Every <color=#82C65D>5</color> hits taken triggers skill Undaunted once

special_equip.name: Tiger Paw
special_equip.description: Don't worry, it's just a touch. It'll be absolutely fine, I promise!

111.name: Angling
111.title: Rhyme of Water

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: Born in a small seaside fishing village, Angling grew up in the company of the sea. She feels a much stronger attachment to the vast sea than to land.

Since food was scarce in the village, Angling, mature beyond her age, volunteered to go fishing with the adults when she was still little—and she showed prodigious talent. Today, her fishing skills put many adult villagers to shame.

In addition to her remarkable talent for fishing, Angling's fish-roasting skills have also earned her much admiration. People can't explain how Angling manages to make fish smell so enticing other than interpreting it as a gift bestowed by sea elves.

Yes, Angling does owe her fish-roasting skills to a sea elf, but not the way people think. One day, she met a food-loving sea elf. The latter took Angling's roasted fish back to her tribe, causing quite a stir. Ever since then, every time Angling goes out fishing, sea elves show up to guide her. That's how she became good friends with a lot of sea elves.

skill1.name: Shark Swipe
skill1.description:
Deals Physical DMG to enemy’s front-row equal to <color=#82C65D>250%</color> of ATK and inflicts the enemy with Gnawing.
