Gnawing: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Angling's ATK per second.

skill2.name: Fish Shadow
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG to all enemies equal to <color=#82C65D>600%</color> of ATK. If there is a Gnawing effect on the enemy, the DMG taken of the enemy will be increased by 50%.

skill3.name: Good Omen
skill3.description: Takes <color=#82C65D>30%</color> less Physical DMG, and reduces Physical DEF of the enemies with Gnawing equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of Angling's ATK.

special_equip.name: Lucky Fishing Rod
special_equip.description: Angling's homemade fishing rod. Once the fish is hooked, it cannot easily break free.

112.name: Cassis
112.title: Floating Captain

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: Formerly a noble sorcerer from the Upper Domain of Cassiel, she couldn't stand the way her fellow people trampled on their Lower Domain counterparts, so she left the Magical Guards and went to the Lower Domain.

Having shed her noble identity, she kept calling upon the Lower Domain commoners to rebel against the abusive ruling class above. Answering her call, the commoners worked together to build a floating ship, powered by the girl's wind magic crystal. With the girl herself at the hem, the ship shuttled back and forth between the two domains, attacking the transport fleet above and distributing the spoils to the downtrodden below.

She is always helping the commoners down below, but she is not in favor of using violence to overthrow the ruling class above. It seems the only reason she joined the Alliance of the Rebellions is that she wanted to return the Floating Isles to the ground so she could start her new adventure.
Deeply trusted by her crew, her words are the law around the fleet. Over time, she has taken on a gruff demeanor that signifies a clean break from her noble past.

skill1.name: Roar of Victory
skill1.description:
Grants all allies a Shield equal to <color=#82C65D>40%</color> of Cassis's max HP that lasts 12 seconds. Also, grants them 12 seconds of Stimulated.
Stimulated: Increases Physical DMG dealt by 25% and converts 20% of Physical DMG dealt to HP.

skill2.name: Burning Wave Attack
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG to all enemies equal to <color=#82C65D>500%</color> of ATK and increases their damage taken by 30% in the next 10 seconds.

skill3.name: Acute Foresight
skill3.description: When an ally takes lethal damage, blocks the damage and heals the ally for <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Cassis's max HP. Can trigger only once per combat.

special_equip.name: Burning Wave
special_equip.description: A weapon Floating Captain wore around the waist. Focuses more on practicality than aesthetics.

113.name: Shiroi
113.title: Hidden Shadow at Sea

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: As one of the few last remaining mermaids, she lives at the bottom of the sea and rarely ventures beyond it.

There was a time when the mermaids lived freely at the bottom of the sea—they would occasionally emerge from the surface and even engage in activities on the shore. Then a catastrophe struck, wiping out a majority of their kind. The few that survived cut themselves off from the outside world and stuck to the seabed.

Shiroi is a good-natured girl, and she has a slight fear of humans after hearing all the bad things her fellow mermaids say about them. Still, she itches to go out to the surface and see the outside world. However, every time she wants to do that, she would immediately be talked down by her kin.
Her only friend is Ardisia, someone who can live in the sea like an elf. She envies her freedom to run and frolic on the beach and constantly pesters her to tell her about what happens out there.

skill1.name: Quenching Rain
skill1.description: Strikes the enemy's front-row 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>120%</color> of self's ATK. For the next 10s, increases 30% of the enemy's DMG taken from Quenching Rain, stacking up to 3 times.

skill2.name: Rolling Rain
skill2.description:
Strikes all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> ATK, and inflicting them with Water Erosion for 30s.
Water Erosion: Reduces Magic DEF by 15% of Shiroi's ATK, stacking up to 3 times.

skill3.name: Pounding Rain
skill3.description: When using Rolling Rain, there is a <color=#82C65D>40%</color> chance of not consuming Energy, while increasing self's ATK by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> for 10s.

special_equip.name: Pearl Shell
special_equip.description: The rain drops and turns into grains of pearls. Shiroi usually hides inside and observes the humans coming and going.

115.name: Evernight Nocturna
115.title: Eternal Oath

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: She has regained her mature appearance as well as her full strength. She is the oldest Bloodsucker in the Holy Church's records.

It used to be that she would recover some of her strength on full moon days, and in so doing, her body would go through unsettling changes. Her sudden regaining of her full strength puzzles her. But still, she is pleased that she got her mature look back.
Personality-wise, she hasn't changed much and remains as innocent as ever, and she never attacks anyone unprovoked. And like before, she likes hanging out with Ella and Metamorphoses.

The news of the oldest Bloodsucker regaining her strength has spread to the Holy Church. The church doesn't really care what happened to Nocturna. They only see her as a heretic threat that needs to be eliminated, and they are already making plans to do so.
Oblivious to any of this, Nocturna is still enjoying her feast in her castle. Little does she know that her peaceful days are numbered...

skill1.name: Bat Dance
skill1.description: Attack the enemy's back row 4 times, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>60%</color> of ATK. If self has the Waxing Moon buff, skill DMG increases by 50%.

skill2.name: Lunar Cycle
skill2.description:
Attacks all enemies 4 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>150%</color> of ATK, then applies 1 stack of Eclipse.
Eclipse: Ignores the enemy's Physical DEF equal to 10% of Evernight Nocturna's ATK; stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, self gains Waxing Moon buff.

skill3.name: Scarlet Oath
skill3.description: Increases Physical DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>16%</color> and converts <color=#82C65D>10%</color> of it into Health recovery. If self has the Waxing Moon buff, Scarlet Oath doubles its effects.

special_equip.name: Seduction
special_equip.description: A hat favored by Nocturna. Nocturna has a lot of confidence in her fashion taste, even though it baffles many people.

116.name: Auris
116.title: Soul Deliverer

vocation.name: Destroyer
vocation.description: Dolls that are not afraid of head-on confrontation.

backstory: A mysterious woman wanders around the cemetery at night, known as the "Agent of Death." The truth is, she just wants to find a place to sleep where no one can disturb her.
She used to serve as an Underworld deliverer under Kyphon. Whenever she sees a wandering ghost in the cemetery, she removes her blindfold and uses her power to escort them to the afterlife.
She is often seen as a weirdo because of the bandages she wears, but her strange appearance belies a gentle heart.
Her desire to live freely in the human world drove her to resign as a deliverer. Still, she often returns to the River of the Underworld to visit her old friends.

skill1.name: Dark Blessing
skill1.description: Provides the lowest-Health ally with a 10-second shield equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Auris's max Health. When the shield is active, the target gains Magic DEF equal to 10% of Auris's max Health

skill2.name: Roaming Spirit
skill2.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Auris's max Health to all enemy targets while inflicting 2 seconds of Stun

skill3.name: Nether Sound
skill3.description: Every 10% of max Health lost increases self's Magic DEF by <color=#82C65D>20%</color>

special_equip.name: Endless Spirit
special_equip.description: A mysterious phantom floating around Auris.

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

skill1.name: Unknown Name
skill1.description: Unknown Description

skill2.name: Unknown Name
skill2.description: Unknown Description

skill3.name: Unknown Name
skill3.description: Unknown Description

special_equip.name: Unknown name
special_equip.description: Unknown description

119.name: Nicolis
119.title: Divine Prayer

vocation.name: Witch
vocation.description: A mysterious figure proficient in an unknown magic.

backstory: Nicolis is the youngest member of the core staff at the Holy Church. Repulsed by church politics, she skips all sorts of meetings under the pretext of doing farm work.
Her casual way of living changes when she meets Anemone, her first friend, who is the only person that can soften Nicolis' bad temper.

In order to minimize Anemone's exposure to the dark side of the Holy Church, Nicolis starts to accept missions that she previously considered unpalatable and even begins to frequently show up at high-level meetings at the church. Shocked by her change of behavior, the church leadership sends people to spy on her.

Clearly, the church leadership and Nicolis have different agendas: The former, hoping to use Anemone to tie Nicolis down, sends Fellagood to manipulate Anemone; the latter, however, is secretly planning an escape with Anemone from the church and its surveillance.
"I heard you and Anemone are good friends. That's good. Let's make this place your burial ground, shall we?"

skill1.name: Holy Boundary
skill1.description: Summons Holy Boundary to deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> of ATK to the enemy's middle row while imprisoning the target for 1s, after which Holy Boundary expands to deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>200%</color> ATK to all enemy targets.

skill2.name: Lost Sins
skill2.description:
Deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>800%</color> of ATK to all enemy targets while inflicting Divine Wail for 15s.
Divine Wail: Receives 20% more DMG from Nicolis; stacks up to 2 times.

skill3.name: Divinity
skill3.description: Every use of a skill reduces a random enemy's Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>8%</color> of Nicolis's ATK; stacks up to 5 times.

special_equip.name: Redemption
special_equip.description: The staff given to Nicolis by the Holy Church leadership. A symbol of her role as a hierophant.

120.name: Danelim
120.title: Princess of the Sea

vocation.name: Mage
vocation.description: Dolls that cast various forms of magic.

backstory: She may appear like a young girl, but Danelim has lived on earth for thousands of years, and during all this time, her personality hasn't changed a bit.

Unlike the Sea Elf, Danelim would often emerge from the sea and play along the beach. From time to time, she gets humans accosting her. But she has a distaste for humans and so would give them the brush-off.
Recently, Danelim built a castle for herself on the beach and was often seen hanging out with Ardisia in it.
Despite her youthful looks, she is even older than the Sea Elf. Age is always a touchy subject for her. So steer clear of it if you don't want to see her wrath.

skill1.name: Misty Tide
skill1.description: Heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of Danelim's ATK and removes all debuffs, increasing their Physical DEF and Magic DEF equal to 30% of Danelim's ATK for 10s.

skill2.name: Healing Flow
skill2.description: Heals all allies for 10s, restoring Health equal to <color=#82C65D>50%</color> of Danelim's ATK per second. Also increases ATK of all allies by 15% and ignores enemy's Physical DEF equal to 10% of Danelim's ATK, stacking up to 3 times.

skill3.name: Peaceful Mind
skill3.description: When an ally takes lethal damage, blocks the damage and reduces the DMG taken of the ally by <color=#82C65D>80%</color> for 4 seconds. Can be triggered only once every 15 seconds.

special_equip.name: Splendor
special_equip.description: Danelim's favorite hair accessory. Even in the darkness of the night, it gives off a radiant glow.

121.name: Amane
121.title: Auspicious Bunny

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Originally an ordinary white bunny in the woods along the border of Lochaber, she transformed into a human after accidentally consuming a magic potion but has retained some of her rabbit traits.
Like Hauen, she is curious about the outside world but has no experience dealing with humans.

To stay fed, Amane comes to a nearby village and tries to fit in with the locals. It's New Year's Day, and she is fascinated by the festive bustle. But the sound of firecrackers frightens her, and she cowers in a corner.
Upon learning that her friend Hauen has made human friends, she decides to go looking for her and make some human friends of her own.

skill1.name: Do Not Bully
skill1.description: Increases self's Crit Chance by 30% for 10s and attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>220%</color> of self's ATK.

skill2.name: Flowing Clouds
skill2.description: Hits all enemy targets with 2 attacks, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>380%</color> of self's ATK. For the next 5s, DMG dealt increases by 20%.

skill3.name: Amane is MAD
skill3.description: Crit DMG increases by<color=#82C65D>50%</color>.

special_equip.name: Wispy Cloud
special_equip.description: Light as the wind, wispy as smoke. Amane's favorite garment.

122.name: Carol
122.title: Ode to Iris

vocation.name: Assassin
vocation.description: Dolls that swiftly deal Physical DMG over time to back row target.

backstory: A noble with a graceful bearing, she stands out from any crowd.

She travels around the Kingdom of Lochaber to learn about the plight of the people in preparation for her ascension to the throne. When the monsters invade, she returns to the capital to lead a fight against them.
Knowing that it would be hard for Lochaber to fight the growing number of monsters alone, she leads a mission to various kingdoms in a bid to form an alliance against the monsters.

Watching people celebrate the new year in a foreign land fills her with nostalgia. Then she reminds herself that emotions and weakness won't do any good for her kingdom, and that her mission is still unfinished.

skill1.name: Gorgeous Strike
skill1.description: Strikes the enemy's front row 2 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>300%</color> of self's ATK.

skill2.name: Wheel Sword Dance
skill2.description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>240%</color> of self's ATK and inflicts the enemy targets with 10 seconds of Timid.
Timid: Decreases the target's Physical and Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>15% </color>of self's ATK for 10s.

skill3.name: Noble Glory
skill3.description: When dealing damage, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>30%</color> of self's ATK.

special_equip.name: Odomera
special_equip.description: A sword handed down over generations in the Kingdom of Lochaber. Reserved for the heir to the throne.

123.name: Snowshine
123.title: Sweet Delivery

vocation.name: Healer
vocation.description: Dolls that provide recovery for the team.

backstory: Snowshine is the child of a human and an elf. Because of the human blood in her body, she was ostracized in the Forest of Elves.

Snowshine likes to use her power to make delicious desserts since she was a child. When she grew up, she opened a dessert store in a human town, which was widely loved by local residents, and even some gourmets went long distances to have a taste.

The elves considered Snowbirds, who were integrated into human society, to be an alien. However, because the elves themselves live far from human society, Snowshine did not suffer from their harassment.
Recently, she has developed new desserts to prepare for the upcoming hot sale in anticipation of the human holiday.

skill1.name: Magic of Love
skill1.description: Increases the DMG taken of all enemies by <color=#82C65D>30%</color> for 10s, and restores 1 Chaos Energy.

skill2.name: Blessings of Love
skill2.description: Restores 1 Order Energy, and heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>520%</color> of self's ATK.

skill3.name: Sweet and Sour Surprise
skill3.description: When using skills, there is a <color=#82C65D>20%</color> chance to restore 1 Chaos Energy.

special_equip.name: Sweet Heartbeat
special_equip.description: Snowshine's newly developed dessert. Popular among young people.

124.name: Geisha
124.title: Emerald Heart

vocation.name: Compeller
vocation.description: Dolls that inflict all sorts of buffs and debuffs.

backstory: Born in the famous gastronomic city Esmeralda in the Kingdom of Belgica, she has a unique gift for tasting sweets, which she probably owes to her special bloodline.
It's said that any shop that earns Geisha's approval will thrive, which some people guess is a blessing from elves.
As the festival approaches, the owners of sweets shops in all the cities of the Kingdom of Belgica are asking about the whereabouts of Geisha, hoping to receive her review and approval.
Recently, Geisha was told that someone was planning to cause trouble at the festival ceremony. Apparently she is not going to let anyone get in the way of people enjoying food.

skill1.name: Obsessive Mind
skill1.description: Increases all DMG Dealt by <color=#82C65D>300%</color> for 5 seconds

skill2.name: Love Shot
skill2.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>420%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets

skill3.name: Clear Mind
skill3.description: After entering combat, Crit Chance increases by <color=#82C65D>10%</color> every 5 seconds, by up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>40%</color>

special_equip.name: Heart Arrow
special_equip.description: A ranged weapon infused with Geisha's thoughts.
